description: Its a physics puzzle game.Both the ball and the lines react to the law of gravity. You can draw any shape you want and they are all followed by physics rules when you draw your first line or polygon..When the physics ball drop into the correct color cup,the level is finished!Beware not to trap the ball inside a group of lines!This educational game features 18 physics problems to solve. If you get stuck, click on the restart button.
descriptionHTML:
Its a physics puzzle game.
Both the ball and the lines react to the law of gravity.
You can draw any shape you want and they are all followed by physics rules when you draw your first line or polygon..
When the physics ball drop into the correct color cup,the level is finished!
Beware not to trap the ball inside a group of lines!
This educational game features 18 physics problems to solve. If you get stuck, click on the restart button.

description: Game of Warriors is a Strategy TD (Tower Defense) game with a unique style in its genre. Set in a magical world you will have to upgrade your defenses and mighty soldiers to survive and siege enemy territories to conquer them.The rival alliance of the evil kingdoms has pushed what remains of the human civilization to a corner of the world, isolated and forgotten, plunged into misery and trying to survive harshly.Ready the horses, hire your warriors and prepare the spears for battle, the war horn will sound again and our titans will destroy the enemy walls and towers.The age of dark empires have come to an end, it's time to recover what rightfully belongs to us, it's time for revolt, war and revenge!The warriors claim your name, lord!Command your gladiators into a battle for eternal glory in this epic clash of warriors.Features:-  Tower Defense (TD) and Strategy game style.-  +1500 defensive waves.-  4 Heroes to unlock.-  +100 territories to conquer.-  +30 soldiers to upgrade.-  +1000 building upgrades.-  4 different races to conquer (Goblins, Skeletons, Worgens and Orcs).-  15 passive and 3 active skills for your general.
descriptionHTML:
Game of Warriors is a Strategy TD (Tower Defense) game with a unique style in its genre. Set in a magical world you will have to upgrade your defenses and mighty soldiers to survive and siege enemy territories to conquer them.

The rival alliance of the evil kingdoms has pushed what remains of the human civilization to a corner of the world, isolated and forgotten, plunged into misery and trying to survive harshly.

Ready the horses, hire your warriors and prepare the spears for battle, the war horn will sound again and our titans will destroy the enemy walls and towers.

The age of dark empires have come to an end, it's time to recover what rightfully belongs to us, it's time for revolt, war and revenge!

The warriors claim your name, lord!

Command your gladiators into a battle for eternal glory in this epic clash of warriors.

Features:

- Tower Defense (TD) and Strategy game style.
- +1500 defensive waves.
- 4 Heroes to unlock.
- +100 territories to conquer.
- +30 soldiers to upgrade.
- +1000 building upgrades.
- 4 different races to conquer (Goblins, Skeletons, Worgens and Orcs).
- 15 passive and 3 active skills for your general.

description: Sudoku for beginners and advanced players. Whether you'd like to relax or keep mind active – pass your free time in a pleasant way! Get a small stimulating break or clear your head with sudoku. Take your favorite app with you wherever you go. Playing Sudoku on mobile is as good as with a real pencil and paper.Choose any level you like. Play easier levels to exercise your brain, logical thinking and memory, or try hard levels to give your mind a real workout. Our classic puzzle game has some features that make sudoku easier for you: hints, auto-check, and duplicates highlight. You can use them or complete the challenge without help – it's up to you! What's more, in our app each puzzle has one solution. You will find all you need whether you are playing your first sudoku, or you've progressed to expert difficulty.Features✓ Complete Daily Challenges and get unique trophies✓ Challenge yourself figuring out your mistakes, or enable Auto-Check to see your mistakes as you go✓ Turn on Pencil mode to make notes as on paper. Each time you fill in a cell, notes are automatically updated!✓ Highlight duplicates to avoid repeating numbers in a row, column and block✓ Hints can guide you through the points when you are stuckMore features- Statistics. Track your progress for each difficulty level: analyze your best time and other achievements- Unlimited Undos. Made a mistake? Just put it back quickly!- Auto-save. If you leave a sudoku unfinished it will be saved. Continue playing anytime- Highlighting of a row, column and box related to the selected cell- Eraser. Get rid of all mistakesHighlights• More than 5,000 well-formed puzzles• 9x9 grid• 4 perfectly balanced levels of difficulty: easy, medium, hard, and expert• Support both phones and tablets• Portrait and landscape mode for tablets• Simple and intuitive designTrain your brain anywhere, anytime!
descriptionHTML:

Choose any level you like. Play easier levels to exercise your brain, logical thinking and memory, or try hard levels to give your mind a real workout. Our classic puzzle game has some features that make sudoku easier for you: hints, auto-check, and duplicates highlight. You can use them or complete the challenge without help – it's up to you! What's more, in our app each puzzle has one solution. You will find all you need whether you are playing your first sudoku, or you've progressed to expert difficulty.

Features
✓ Complete Daily Challenges and get unique trophies
✓ Challenge yourself figuring out your mistakes, or enable Auto-Check to see your mistakes as you go
✓ Turn on Pencil mode to make notes as on paper. Each time you fill in a cell, notes are automatically updated!
✓ Highlight duplicates to avoid repeating numbers in a row, column and block
✓ Hints can guide you through the points when you are stuck

More features
- Statistics. Track your progress for each difficulty level: analyze your best time and other achievements
- Unlimited Undos. Made a mistake? Just put it back quickly!
- Auto-save. If you leave a sudoku unfinished it will be saved. Continue playing anytime
- Highlighting of a row, column and box related to the selected cell
- Eraser. Get rid of all mistakes

Highlights
• More than 5,000 well-formed puzzles
• 9x9 grid
• 4 perfectly balanced levels of difficulty: easy, medium, hard, and expert
• Support both phones and tablets
• Portrait and landscape mode for tablets
• Simple and intuitive design

Train your brain anywhere, anytime!

descriptionHTML:
- # 1 - TOP - BEST - NEW -

Pixel Craft: Zombie Exploration - one of the best pixelated games in the first-person mode, time-tested! This game will not leave you indifferent and will present many interesting subjects and opportunities.

This game is created in the style of a sandbox with an open world, in which the player does not have any specific goals. You choose what to do in this game.

Explore the endless world of blocks and cubes. The most interesting war against zombies at night. Crafting and gathering, survival and building. And much much much more ...

- # 1 - TOP - BEST - NEW -

Pixel Craft: Zombie Exploration provides the player with a three-dimensional generated world, entirely consisting of cubic blocks. This world you can freely rebuild, creating from the blocks of complex structures.

Features:

*** Easy operation and unrivaled interface
*** A lot of game modes of the game.
*** Numerous types of weapons for your taste.
*** Zombies and fighting with them.
*** The most diverse construction. Even more possibilities for creativity without limits.
*** Beautiful pixel graphics Super HD. Very beautiful texture in high resolution.
*** High FPS, without compromise.
*** For children and adults.

- # 1 - TOP - BEST - NEW -

The game has three modes.

Survival mode.
In this mode, you must extract natural resources (wood and stone, various minerals). Of these, you can build a variety of tools, blocks and elements. In the dark hours of the day there are dangerous monsters and zombies.

Creativity.
In this mode, you have unlimited access to all things, things, and building blocks. You can instantly destroy any blocks.

Multiplayer mode.
The name of this regime speaks for itself. Play with your friends and win.

- # 1 - TOP - BEST - NEW -

The game is developed by a professional team of developers with the involvement of design, rezhsure and sound specialists.

The pixel world is waiting for you!

comments: I like this game a lot BUT the lack of gems takes the fun out of it.  I've tried a few times to get free gems by installing game's or completing a quiz but I only sometimes get the gems after. And the casino boat thing is a joke. You barely win anything😕 I noticed nearly everyone is complaining about the same thing so I've been waiting for this to be sorted. Nothing has changed so I'll be deleting the app shortly..... What a pity!

If you love using your hard earned money for virtual play this is the game for you. What starts out with gems being a few at low amts as you advance the gem amt grows ridiculously outrageous. Move on because this game will break your bank account quickly.

It's a pretty entertaining game. BUT you have to buy EVERYTHING with gems (aka real money). Programmers focus excessively on making players pay even before they are hooked to the game!!! After getting to the second street zone, I find myself unable to continue unless I pay. I find it a little lame after all the effort you put on creating a pretty good game. Bye

Cute to see yall deleted my last review. Re writing and giving you 1 star.  Game crashes constantly. . Can no longer get into.  No more money will be spent till fixed. And if my review is removed again. I will just uninstall

You can't proceed without gems once you unlock the second area. Pretty sad, because the game has potential. Hate to see greed override balance. You should be able to grind in a game like this and proceed... Not get stuck because you choose not to spend excessive amounts of cash.

The ga,e is pretty fun and addicting, but it's a cash grab. It's ridiculous to require gems for upgrades which allows you to advance in the game. The free gems given are few and far between which forces the gamer to either give up playing or buy gems. I won't pay for gems. I'll stop playing instead. Thanks for the 15 minutes of fun.

description:
The devious pranksters are back at it again with an all new trolling nightmare: Troll Face Quest Video Games 2! Spoof iconic video games and prank the pants off all those characters. Get lost in a crazy world of video game shenanigans and try to escape the pranking trolls!
PHONE-SMASHING FEATURES
• 85+ million installs across the legendary Troll Face Quest franchise!• Troll famous video games!• 35+ hilarious levels of pranking insanity!• Unlock insane achievements!• Lots of wacky collectibles!• No Wi-fi needed!• A funny trip through a loony video game world!
THE RETURN OF TROLL RAIDER
Get ready for a trolling adventure that’ll take you back to your intense video game playing days. Troll  adventurous, monkey-swinging babes in tight shorts, steal the wheels from an Italian plumber’s go-kart , prank entire cities under the rule of theft, murder, and mayhem, and piss off birds for no good reason. Will you solve the crazy pranks and win a chicken dinner or will you end up in the loony bin? It’s payback time for all those levels you didn’t complete.
TROLLING TIME NEVER RUNS OUT
A whirlwind of trolls and pranks, this is another baffling game that will make you throw your cell phones against the wall. Keep your eye on the ball and crush the prankster video game characters before they troll you into the dirt!
Do you have the guts to prank your childhood video game stars into oblivion?

description: The moms are testing the dads’ mettle in this fun take on an age-old debate! Who will end up victorious?  ♂️ ♀️We’ve all been there, whether as parents or kids – why aren’t chores split evenly in the family? Why does one person always seem to do almost everything (❗) and, most importantly, what can you do about it? Emily and Patrick face (and answer!) this question in Emily’s newest story, Moms vs Dads!  ♂️ ♀️🏆 Manage both dads and moms in this fun time management story game!🏆 Play your way through 60 story levels plus 30 challenge levels🏆 Get to know the differences between the four couples! Who will you be rooting for?🏆 Take in six fun locations including favorites like Camp Talon and Emily’s house🏆 Earn diamonds and build your own kids’ paradise in Emily’s back yard🏆 Beat daily challenges to earn extra diamonds🏆 Collect all the postcards and send heartfelt greetings to all your loved ones🏆 Help Emily and Patrick discover what is truly important in lifeEmily is thrilled with her family, but now that she has three kids, it seems there’s 10 times the work! Balancing her work in the diner, her cooking vlog, her chores AND her family is getting harder and harder. When she notices Patrick acting like playing with the kids occasionally is him doing his fair share, she decides she’s had enough! 👶🏻 👶🏽Her girlfriends all have similar experiences - men who don’t help out in the house unless asked, men who only “babysit” their own kids…. and they’ve had enough! It’s time to ACT, and show them how much work it really is. Can the girls get their men dashing around the house, or will this end up being a recipe for disaster?
descriptionHTML:
The moms are testing the dads’ mettle in this fun take on an age-old debate! Who will end up victorious? ♂️ ♀️

We’ve all been there, whether as parents or kids – why aren’t chores split evenly in the family? Why does one person always seem to do almost everything (❗) and, most importantly, what can you do about it? Emily and Patrick face (and answer!) this question in Emily’s newest story, Moms vs Dads! ♂️ ♀️

🏆 Manage both dads and moms in this fun time management story game!
🏆 Play your way through 60 story levels plus 30 challenge levels
🏆 Get to know the differences between the four couples! Who will you be rooting for?
🏆 Take in six fun locations including favorites like Camp Talon and Emily’s house
🏆 Earn diamonds and build your own kids’ paradise in Emily’s back yard
🏆 Beat daily challenges to earn extra diamonds
🏆 Collect all the postcards and send heartfelt greetings to all your loved ones
🏆 Help Emily and Patrick discover what is truly important in life

Emily is thrilled with her family, but now that she has three kids, it seems there’s 10 times the work! Balancing her work in the diner, her cooking vlog, her chores AND her family is getting harder and harder. When she notices Patrick acting like playing with the kids occasionally is him doing his fair share, she decides she’s had enough! 👶🏻 👶🏽

Her girlfriends all have similar experiences - men who don’t help out in the house unless asked, men who only “babysit” their own kids…. and they’ve had enough! It’s time to ACT, and show them how much work it really is. Can the girls get their men dashing around the house, or will this end up being a recipe for disaster?

comments: Basically Gran Turismo 3 for Android. 10/10 game and love that ads aren't forced but there is also a reward for watching. It isn't really a grind to get credits. Love the updates especially the Toyota update. Looking forward to more in the future.  02/03/18 edit: Would it be possible to bring back offline mode for us that aren't able to always be online?

I rarely write reviews but this game is a gem in the rough. I love it. Physics are on point, progression feels just right and the audiovisual experience never disappoints. 2 requests though. 1) There's a display glitch: I painted my Dodge SRT Challenger Hellcat purple but in Pro races it displays white. In Drift though it shows purple. Weird. 2) My friends and I would LOVE to see Assoluto X Audi! Can Audi be added? :)

I have a concern about the honda's engine... nsx sound good then the rest sounds like a little off... and could you guys pls take into consideration in fixing the sykylines from r32 to r34... they tend to oversteer alot with or without attessa... and why certain cars have smaller rims?... looks like a drag car... like the skyline r32... after changing rims... its still the same size

So here i was after having earned all the credits to upgrade a turbo mustang and having bought the parts, thinking how cool it was that the developers allowed it to be turbocharged and thought this was an easter egg until the most recent update in which my mustang has lost 200hp and i have lost all the credits i spent upgrading it as a turbo vehicle. Not cool at all. Pretty pissed about this whole situation.

The reason for my lower rating is simply because it's available on the android TV store, I can use a mouse to navigate the interface, but I cannot map the controls to the Nvidia shield gamepad, the inbuilt mapper doesn't recognize most buttons including thumb stick for steering. It effectively makes this game unplayable on the Nvidia shield.

I've upgraded my phone, and now i could really enjoy the full potential of this game. Graphics are absolutely brilliant! I've had mine set on 1440p and max quality, it's beautiful to look at. The physics of the car is awesome, feels like I'm playing a simulation racing game built for PC. It feels that good. The cars, well maybe some of them not properly modelled in my opinion, but it still looks awesome, and the engine sounds..., they're absolutely spot on, especially The AMG GT. Really love that V8 sound. But somehow, i demand a bit of a sound update, because in my opinion, some of it are not similar to the one in real life. It's just a small improvement maybe, but it will give a HUGE immersion in playing Assoluto Racing. For customization, it's enough in my opinion, but adding some aero kit won't let me down tho😂 Multiplayer is the most awesome feature yet, and it works well. Well this is my short review, and it's definitely worth staying on my phone to kill some time. Kudos to the developers😊🙏 Edit : take a look at the 190E Evo, it had a weird rear wheel offset imo, and the Ford Mustang, it's rear wheels are misaligned. They're slightly overlapping the rear bumper.

comments: This game is have potential, don't ruined it because of money. I have never been watching so many ads In my life just to get some 2 stars parts. Instead of being creative and making cool machines, this game is turning to - either pay to win or watch alot of ads to win. What's the point of "playing" in this game?

I think this app is great! But there is a slight problem with selling items. When I repeatedly sell items, sometimes if, for example, I was selling an item for 6831 coins, then it would subtract 6831 from the total amount of coins I have and then add back in 6831 so I'd end up with just the same amount of coins I was at! Could you please fix this small bug? It would make this app even better!

Developers, please read.  First, this is a fun game and I enjoy its play style. It's reminiscent of TV shows like Battles Bots and game series' like Bot Arena.   Second, I would like to suggest giving players the ability to add, delete, and move weapon, utility, and wheel anchors. In the same way players can currently add enhancements to parts and chassis's and move around stickers.   Third, It would be appreciated if Quick Play Super Boxes replaced Regular Boxes after all shipment slots are full. It would provide a greater incentive to keep playing Quick Play beyond just Winning Streak Crown Rewards.  I'm offering these suggestions because I really enjoy this game and would like to see it become a more fulfilling and personalized experience.  Thank you,

I absolutely love this game. I spend a lot of time on it! It's fairly balanced between players who play for free and those who purchase gems to give their bots better stats. You can easily rank up without paying a dime. I did for so long, until I kept hoarding pieces and didn't want to sell. I began to use gems instead of coins.

Fun strategy game, just wish it was easier to understand upgrades and easier to get a decent vehicle. Sometimes you have to wait for boxes other times you can watch ads to get thru them with no rhyme or reason as far as I can tell. The variety or maybe the lack of variety in boxes is pretty annoying. Sometimes you get the exact same part multiple times or with slight variations, which can drag out trying to get a decent upgrade on things.

Game it self is great and a ton of fun.   But, the system for showing ads is so annoying.  It's not just your normal video ad no, they make you watch 3 different ads and a min of 16 or 11 sec each.  After you have watched the minimum time, you have to hit next and repeat again

comments: Fun game, good time killer, great graphics. Unfortunately,  like with many other games, they sucker you in with rewards at the start only for you to soon hit a paywall. It's  either grind and hope you get lucky or give into the many game ads promoting cash purchases. Anything involving actually online play (co-op, PvP etc) seems to freeze or have crazy lag. Good game, definitely has room for improvement.

It's a good cover-based shooter, with some pretty creative characters and a good pace for quick battles. The unlock system is more than fair, with the ability to save currencies for that one big purchase. I enjoy the ability to play at my own pace without sacrificing my life to the game (cough*Kabam*cough) and I'm having a lot of fun. I've noticed that PVP tends to favor Savage, when he activates Spray and Pray once, half the opposing team dies. Twice, and the round is over. Otherwise a very well done and enjoyable game.

I really enjoy the action this game brings along with good looks and simple controls. Too many times development teams get caught up in the visuals or complex control schemes and forget about what gamers really love and that's not having a complex control panel with nice smooth transition from level to level. Thank you for making this game a joy to play every time I turn it on.

Good concept. Good game. Many glitches. For a game that's touted for and based on pvp it makes no sense that %80 of the time the game freezes going into a pvp battle. It's okay though, you can close it and then immediately reopen it to a message that tells you that you died. Fix your freezing problems and I'd give you 4 stars.

Really solid graphics and game play for mobile. Doesn't want to work with my Bluetooth controller. As a free game they have really doubled down on the shards and multiple currencies to try to get you to spend. You really need to grind if you want to unlock anything without paying.

Good game plagued by hackers who like mimicking Crosses stun constantly.    As well as I would wish the AI would auto pilot itself a bit better when your controlling a hero then having to decide if you want to control a hero at the cost of your other members being brick headed or every One being average.

comments: All is excellent. Great selection of cars, easy controls, strategic maps. It's all of that for a game this size, and it's great!. But I think it misses some things, which I want it to be added: 1) stickshift like control. Manual feel. 2) multiplayer. Kind of feeling a bit lonely. 3) more way to tune the car. Etc. Gear ratios, tire pressure. 4) more variation of game mode and upgrades that suit them? As of for racing mode circuit like style. Rather than all those, the game is already excellent and simply amazing.

Good day devs, I really liked your game. Free tuning for the most part was my reason for playing this game. However, I'd like to suggest to add some more tuning features, like toe tuning for tires, etc. Also, I understand the game is all about drifting, but will it be possible that you guys give some grip to the tires? It will still be possible to drift with grip anyway; the "much sliding" is not so pleasant - for me that is. Overall, I really love this game. Thank you, hopefully you think about my suggestion.  Update: also, pls add clutch pedal option. The brakes also really need some work guys. Please..

It's a very nice game but you still need to improve controls a little bit cause even though I'm now turning too much it always ended up oversteering. Also the graphics needs improvement, the smoke(actually not existing by now), the car reflection(based on what type of the paint is, like chrome,matte etc) and the textures of the environment. Another is the sounds, it doesn't sound that good(on other cars like the s15). Also the customization is not existing by now but i recommend adding it. It will make the game better. Overall, the game is good but it needs more improvement 😊 Cheers Devs! Peace out!

Developers, I really would like for you to make the handling less "sharp" and more detailed. When i go around a corner, I feel like i can spin out at any time. I'd also really love for a additon of body kits and more wheels and maybe even more cars. But please, work on the controls. Its not very grippy. I also play Drift Horizon, and I've got the drifting down on that app. Thank you.   -Michael

Great game the best drifting game I have ever played... But it could do with some body kits and stuff... Also could u add more cars and tracks plz it's getting a bit boring just racing in the same cars but. Thank you 😄😄😄
this is just a more gay version of drift horizon and car x drift racing combined car feels super bad to drift no multiplayer. just an all round bad game and the cars sound like a lawn mower

The best survivor royale esque game you can find on the play store. Takes up immensely less space than others like Rules of Survival. Anyone can play this, no matter the quality of their phone. It's intense solo, duo, and squad gameplay will always have you coming back to take a shot (no pun intended) at another win. An amazing feature is it's voice chat communication system. You can talk to your teammates (though unfortunately, I find most players speak Spanish. You may have more luck.) though i wish there was a text chat as well. It will hopefully come in the next update, bur I would definitely recommend getting this game. My only other suggestion is new maps, a night mode, more weapons, and attachments.

This is a really great game, I think it can go to heights where it'll have a PC version with a bigger city, more weapon's and kill tactics. It should really consider creating a store which has more item's though . Also can you add gas cans strategicallyy to the game, I'd love to blow up someone hiding in a factory :) . Other than that, its a gteT game , I'm at Level 13  and have tons of kills already in all modes so I figured you deserve a review at this point.   Keep up the great work, I love this game so far.

description: Free Fire - Battlegrounds is the ultimate survival shooter game available on mobile. Each 10-minute game places you on a remote island where you are pit against 50 other players, all seeking survival. Players freely choose their starting point with their parachute, and aim to stay in the safe zone for as long as possible. Drive vehicles to explore the vast map, hide in trenches, or become invisible by proning under grass. Ambush, snipe, survive, there is only one goal: to survive.[Form guilds]Form the strongest guild and let it rip on the battlegrounds![Battlegrounds in its original form]Search for weapons, stay in the play zone, loot your enemies and become the last man standing. Along the way, go for airdrops while avoiding airstrikes to gain that little edge against other players.[10 minutes, 50 players, epic survival goodness awaits]Within 10 minutes, a new survivor will emerge. Will it be you?[4-man squad, with in-game voice chat]Create squads of up to 4 players and establish communication with your squad at the very first moment. Command your friends to victory and be the last team standing.[Realistic and smooth graphics]Easy to use controls and smooth graphics promises the best survival experience you will find on mobile.[Contact us]Facebook: https://facebook.com/freefireEN
descriptionHTML:
Free Fire - Battlegrounds is the ultimate survival shooter game available on mobile. Each 10-minute game places you on a remote island where you are pit against 50 other players, all seeking survival. Players freely choose their starting point with their parachute, and aim to stay in the safe zone for as long as possible. Drive vehicles to explore the vast map, hide in trenches, or become invisible by proning under grass. Ambush, snipe, survive, there is only one goal: to survive.

comments: l was enjoying the game a lot and would have given it 5 stars. l spent a long time to get enough bricks to  build a level 7 home so dragons only needed 7 mins sleep.. NOW    only  the same 5 of my 30 dragons get out and this is making collecting bricks and healing power very slow. l have not seen all my green dragons and moon dragons( the hardest workers) for 2 days now. developers please help or l will stop playing. TY.

I would love to give this game 5 stars but 99% of the ground I've uncovered is covered by "treasure chests" and there's no way to get rid of them or contact the game makers for help. I've completely run out of space and can't play anymore. The chests should disappear after 3 - 5 days if they're not opened.

Love this game. Graphics are great and so much to do. Keeps me going for ages. Main concern and the reason I've not rated 5 star is the time it takes to get each token. When some levels take 7 and it takes half a day to fill up it's a major pain. Then you do a level that needs 4 and the next also 4 it takes the p*ss. Would be great to have a higher limit without getting charged or for them to fill up quicker. If this was done I would rate 5 star all round.

2/5 stars because the only way to play the game is by paying! You can either pay to remove "pay to open" boxes or they don't go away taking up all your space! It takes 1 hr for your chalices (energy) to refill only 1 and you only get 7. Love the concept of the game and it is very unique but make it so that people can actually play. Get sponsors, play some ads, have the boxes disappear after a certain amount of time, ANYYHING! This is b*lls*it and not everyone has money to throw away on games. Fix it or I keep the rating low.

Playing this game makes me lose track of time. Wish we could buy the dragon egg chests with game coins.  That would be greatly helpful. Please consider this. Also would be great to transfer items from other levels back to the camp, like eggs, flowers, etc. Plz have this feature.Thanks. Plus would help if there was a set button to hit to exit the game. I am finding it takes between a few to about 5 times to hit the back button on my tablet. Plz fix, would make things alot quicker.

Buggy.  The game itself was pretty good but there are issues with the cloud save deleting peoples games + all their in-app purchases (like me). The support for the game is non-existent. They have one email address to send issues to, and it's been weeks, almost a month, since and there has been no response. So everything is gone and they can't be bothered to try and restore my account for a month.   In short, it was fun and addictive, but your game will delete itself eventually and the support staff doesn't care since they already have your money.
description: Discover dragon legends, magic, quests, and a secret land of entertainment and mystery in the world of Merge Dragons! where you can combine everything into better and better things by matching! In a mystical world hidden among the clouds, the vale of Dragonia flourished. Then evil Zomblins cast a void across the vale. The only hope to heal the land rests in YOUR magical power to MATCH ANYTHING -- dragon eggs, trees, treasures, stars, magical flowers, and even mythical creatures.Match eggs to hatch helpful dragons, then evolve them to discover more powerful dragons! Figure out challenging puzzle levels: match the Gaia statues to win, then bring rewards back to your Camp to collect and grow.What will you discover as you match your camp to perfection and nurture your dragons?MERGE DRAGONS! FEATURES:== Match Objects ==• Discover over 500 fantastic objects to match and interact with.• Freely drag objects around the beautiful world and match 3 of a kind evolve them into better things!• Match nearly anything - plants, buildings, coins, treasures, fallen stars, magic objects, mythical creatures, and more!• Match Life Essence and tap it to unleash power to heal the vale!• Discover the Gaia statues stuck in each level’s cursed land. Match them to solve the puzzle and create life!== Collect New Dragon Breeds ==• Discover 17 dragon breeds who live in the vale, and evolve them through 8 growth stages for new dragons!• Match eggs to hatch helpful dragons who will roam the vale and harvest objects for you to use or match.== Tricky Puzzles ==• Over 600 quests to challenge your mind!• Test your puzzle solving skills in more than 140 tricky levels filled with new quests and rewards to help you build your dragon camp!• Discover hidden levels - can you find them all?• On your puzzle journey, you may cross paths with evil Zomblins. Watch out and be careful!Download now and discover where Merge Dragons! will take you!Merge Dragons! is brought to you by Gram Games, the studio behind the top hit titles 1010!, Merged!, Six!, Bounzy!, Merge Town!, Merge Farm!, and Paint Tower!Optimized for Tablets. No Internet connection required.
descriptionHTML:
Discover dragon legends, magic, quests, and a secret land of entertainment and mystery in the world of Merge Dragons! where you can combine everything into better and better things by matching!

In a mystical world hidden among the clouds, the vale of Dragonia flourished. Then evil Zomblins cast a void across the vale. The only hope to heal the land rests in YOUR magical power to MATCH ANYTHING -- dragon eggs, trees, treasures, stars, magical flowers, and even mythical creatures.

Match eggs to hatch helpful dragons, then evolve them to discover more powerful dragons! Figure out challenging puzzle levels: match the Gaia statues to win, then bring rewards back to your Camp to collect and grow.

What will you discover as you match your camp to perfection and nurture your dragons?

MERGE DRAGONS! FEATURES:

== Match Objects ==
• Discover over 500 fantastic objects to match and interact with.
• Freely drag objects around the beautiful world and match 3 of a kind evolve them into better things!
• Match nearly anything - plants, buildings, coins, treasures, fallen stars, magic objects, mythical creatures, and more!
• Match Life Essence and tap it to unleash power to heal the vale!
• Discover the Gaia statues stuck in each level’s cursed land. Match them to solve the puzzle and create life!

== Collect New Dragon Breeds ==
• Discover 17 dragon breeds who live in the vale, and evolve them through 8 growth stages for new dragons!
• Match eggs to hatch helpful dragons who will roam the vale and harvest objects for you to use or match.

== Tricky Puzzles ==
• Over 600 quests to challenge your mind!
• Test your puzzle solving skills in more than 140 tricky levels filled with new quests and rewards to help you build your dragon camp!
• Discover hidden levels - can you find them all?
• On your puzzle journey, you may cross paths with evil Zomblins. Watch out and be careful!

Download now and discover where Merge Dragons! will take you!

Merge Dragons! is brought to you by Gram Games, the studio behind the top hit titles 1010!, Merged!, Six!, Bounzy!, Merge Town!, Merge Farm!, and Paint Tower!

Optimized for Tablets. No Internet connection required.
developerAddress: 100 Cambridge Grove, The Aircraft Factory, London W6 0LE, United Kingdom
recentChanges: - An all-new premium land for players to explore!
- Tier 2 Midas Drake & Pegasus Dragons have slightly higher Dragon Power.
- The Stone Brick merge chain has been extended to include 9 levels.
- Top level Mushrooms are now properly marked as “Wonders”.
- Visual changes to coins, and other minor changes.
summary: Match everything in your world to create life and heal the land!
title: Merge Dragons!

comments: Has a lot of potential. The game itself at this point isn't that good, at least for me, because I want it to be like.. sims. The characters need a bit of free will, what I mean is I can control the main character freely, and talk to the children and not being like a mannequin. The control for the camera is a bit weird. Overall... hmm... I don't like it.. because it looks like a kids game.

The game is kind of fun and the controls are good but it would be better if it was an open world game and you had more freedom to walk around and things to do on your own instead of just following the directions and the goals. Other than that the game is pretty fun but does get boring after awhile since it's not an open world

It's an okay game. I beat it all the way to level 18 and there wasn't anymore levels. Needs more independence upon what mom does. Also kind of childish to keep having the navigating hand. The graphics could be better as well. But good concept. Once more is added I'll  reinstall it and rate it over. Thanks

Bad controls make it very frustrating. There's just not much going on but walking around with extreme difficulty due to controls. Also the neighbors houses are tiny if you walk up to one the front door only goes to your waist.
Why does mom have to do tasks like find husband's socks while he stands still=annoying. ALSO THE CAMERA BLOCKS THE PLAYER'S VIEW =even more annoying. But good job on the graphics
Too many ads! Every time I go to the next level I have to wait for ages and by the time its loaded I am bored! Maybe make the levels last longer? Other than that its OK!
description: This game is a variant of Virtual DAD, and just as fun! Virtual In the midst of a hectic urban neighborhood, Mom is up and ready to take on the day. You’re the boss here. Take care of tough tasks like managing all the household activities at once! Get all your daily tasks done in time to progress to the next day! If you fall behind, your family will, too! This game is all about micromanagement and multitasking. Wash the monstrous mountain of dishes. Prepare your kids’ breakfast and lunches, and get them ready for school. Take care of the gardening in the backyard, clean the car, feed and walk the dog, vacuum the whole house, and more! Step into the shoes of a mom’s daily life. This game plays on the element of surprise. Expect the unexpected, as surprise events will pop up during your routine, and make your day much more difficult! The completion of every level increases the variety and difficulty of tasks.The life of a mom is demanding. Don’t let your family down! Be a SUPERMOM for your family!Virtual Mom Happy Family 3D Features:• High Quality 3D Graphics• Awesome Sounds for Maximum Fun! • Smooth and Easy Controls• Addictive Game Play• Super Cool House Environment• Family Woman Life Simulation• Daily Household Tasks Based Missions to Complete

More than 17,000,000 players worldwide!
Kiss Kiss: spin the bottle is the best game for chatting, dating, and having fun with players in your city and around the world.

Complete fun, simple tasks to find a multitude of new friends. Chat and swap compliments, participate in friendly matches, bombard your competitors with snowballs, get more kisses than anyone else and win in contests.

Kiss Kiss: spin the bottle is:
❤ A fun game to play spin the bottle (or truth or dare) with friends from Facebook, as well as more than 17 players from all over the world
❤ Talk openly in age-specific chats about anything
❤ Complete tasks that will help you in simple and easy ways to get to know people you find attractive.
❤ Date, give/take kisses, compliments and gifts
❤ Play in fun contests, matches and competitions
❤ Create a unique and individual look to show off how awesome you are
❤ Form clans with new friends and others close to you

How is Kiss Kiss played?:

Spin the bottle! During a game, the Bottle will point to a random user of the opposite sex with whom you then have a chance to kiss. Whether you kiss them or not is up to you. You will soon find out with which users at the table you share a mutual attraction! Send free virtual gifts and compliments to users you like, or choose to bombard those you don’t like with snowballs and eggs. By completing simple and fun tasks you will easily get to know people you find attractive. Also, by gathering one of many gift collections you will receive a beautiful photo frame that'll help you get even more likes.

Contact a Support: support@getkisskiss.com

description: If you love makeup, beauty secrets and Ice Princess, then this game was made for you!  Play to enter a magical make-up salon and apply beauty products on the beautiful princess of winter!In this game for girls you’ll have complete freedom to design an endless collection of different looks and styles, with unforgettable makeups and fairy-like hairdos. Ice Princess will challenge your imagination with tons of crystal-like eye-shadows, blush colors and amazing lipsticks, plus, absolutely fabulous and wintry face-paints to give the makeup a final touch of awesomeness.And when it comes to the hairstyles chapter, be sure you’ll have tons to choose from! Ice-Princess loves changing the color and looks each day, so all you need to do is choose!Browse through tens of colorful hairstyles, braids and ponytails, then choose your favorite hairlock color to glam the fancy hairdo up.For a final touch, choose from the wonderful tiaras collection the one that will make your queen of all the lands of ice shine the most! descriptionHTML:
If you love makeup, beauty secrets and Ice Princess, then this game was made for you!
Play to enter a magical make-up salon and apply beauty products on the beautiful princess of winter!

In this game for girls you’ll have complete freedom to design an endless collection of different looks and styles, with unforgettable makeups and fairy-like hairdos. Ice Princess will challenge your imagination with tons of crystal-like eye-shadows, blush colors and amazing lipsticks, plus, absolutely fabulous and wintry face-paints to give the makeup a final touch of awesomeness.

And when it comes to the hairstyles chapter, be sure you’ll have tons to choose from! Ice-Princess loves changing the color and looks each day, so all you need to do is choose!
Browse through tens of colorful hairstyles, braids and ponytails, then choose your favorite hairlock color to glam the fancy hairdo up.

For a final touch, choose from the wonderful tiaras collection the one that will make your queen of all the lands of ice shine the most! Match it up with a divine top, and there you have if: the story is complete and your princess is ready to charm the world once more with diamonds sparkles and winter-glam all around.

• Play to discover all these wintertime features:
• Skin-tones and blushes
• Eye-lenses and eyebrows
• Fabulous mascaras
• Tons of glamorous eyeshadows
• Sparkly and matte lipstick colors
• Wintry face-paints
• Icy tops
• Necklaces and earrings
• Beautiful hairstyles
• Wonderful tiaras

So if you’re looking for a casual game that combines the magic of the most wintry winter, with beauty, icy jewels, and fabulous makeup, here it is!

description: Do you want to have fun on Christmas holidays? Download our game and you will not be bored in long winter evenings!It is an unforgettable adventure in a mysterious world. In this game there are many randomly generated worlds: from snow-capped mountains and a huge snow-covered forest to tropical jungles and dangerous marshes. Each of these worlds hides many secrets.Here you will feel the freedom for your creativity. To do this, we added a lot of Christmas items to the game, which will create for you an atmosphere of celebration and Christmas magic.Play in creative mode with unlimited resources or get into the wilds of the world in the mode of survival, making weapons and armor to fight its inhabitants. Explore endless worlds and build the most incredible buildings, from simple houses to majestic structures. Have a good game!  Merry Christmas! Features:А lot of Christmas items.Beautiful graphics in high expansion.It is supported by all modern devices.Free flight mode.Two game modes: survival and creativity.Randomly generated maps with complete freedom of action.Dynamically changing world.Many different locations.Many different blocks and objects.For all ages.Please, support the developers - give our game 5 STARS and it will inspire us.
descriptionHTML:
Do you want to have fun on Christmas holidays? Download our game and you will not be bored in long winter evenings!
It is an unforgettable adventure in a mysterious world. In this game there are many randomly generated worlds: from snow-capped mountains and a huge snow-covered forest to tropical jungles and dangerous marshes. Each of these worlds hides many secrets.
Here you will feel the freedom for your creativity. To do this, we added a lot of Christmas items to the game, which will create for you an atmosphere of celebration and Christmas magic.
Play in creative mode with unlimited resources or get into the wilds of the world in the mode of survival, making weapons and armor to fight its inhabitants. Explore endless worlds and build the most incredible buildings, from simple houses to majestic structures.
Have a good game! Merry Christmas!

А lot of Christmas items.
Beautiful graphics in high expansion.
It is supported by all modern devices.
Free flight mode.
Two game modes: survival and creativity.
Randomly generated maps with complete freedom of action.
Dynamically changing world.
Many different locations.
Many different blocks and objects.
For all ages.

Please, support the developers - give our game 5 STARS and it will inspire us.

description: This baby girl is definitely asking for your professional help in this hairstyle game because either you are prepared to offer it or not you need to play it right away at least to try. First you are going to wash her hair to make it clean and nice, then you'll brush her to get rid of the extra hair, then you will make a nice braided hairstyle to make her happy. But the caring process is more than a simple washing, first you will cut off the damaged hair which has no chance of recovery. Brush the hair as long as the instructions will indicate and just apply the shampoo to offer that extra volume and shine. To prevent the dehydration and the split ends you must put on a special mask for the hair that you will do it yourself. Add the given ingredients, mix them and apply the final composition on the head. Wash the hair again, dry it and arrange the rebel hair yarns. Now all that is left is the braiding part where you will literally gather the hair and place it in the shown spot to get a nice and well arranged headdress. When you are done you can even add a nice head band with beautiful colors and details on it. Have fun and remember to play not only to get better, but to fulfill your inner passion.  You really don't want to miss these cool features presented by this hair styling game:- Free to play- Pretty easy to handle the control- Entertain yourself with quality music and nice graphics- Be a hairstylist as good as you can be in the braided area- Multitude of processes to accomplish- Take care of a dehydrated hair and cut the damaged hair yarns- Put together the strands that needs to be taken for a well executed braid- Moisturize the hair with a home made mask that you are making

description: Today we decide to bring you another kind of princess makeup games, much better than our older makeup salon games and the first one is called Princess Makeup and Nail Salon, where all girls which like fashion and nail games can change a cute doll in a real princess, using tons of cosmetics, colors and clothes.Now your dreams came true and you have a big and complete beauty makeup salon and there you can prove your makeup artist skills and transform your favorite doll in a gorgeous princess. In the beginning she needs a beauty treatment of her skin, a stunning makeup with beautiful colors, some pretty blouses and necklaces and at the end a pretty manicure with gorgeous patterns for her nails.First step in all our princess makeup games is to use our special creams for a beauty skin treatment. Apply a facial mask, use the shower and do not forget to use also the eye mask. At the end of this level of our makeup salon games tour doll is ready for the next step.The second level will bring you in a world of colors. Tons of colors for lipstick and eyeshadows are available for you and you must pick what you like most. Use red or yellow, blue or green, combine them and make a real rainbow if you want. Try all you believe that will be nice for the pretty doll. The lipstick will complete this nice makeup and be sure that the color of lips will match with the color of makeup. To complete this fabulous look, choose elegant dresses and beautiful jewerly.After this princess makeup games part, we invite you in a virtual nail salon for one of the most fancy manicure that you can try for your princess. There are a lot of nail polish and you may choose the one you want or even combine the colors for each nail. Will be awesome, for sure ! The gorgeous patterns will complete your work in the nail salon games and your client will be very happy.Princess Makeup and Nail Salon Games features :- a big beauty makeup salon with a lot of creams and cosmetics treatments- a complete makeup box for princess makeup games- a virtual nail salon with all you want for a perfect manicure- a lot of colors for nail polish like in all our nail games- elegant dresses and accessories- easy to play, like all our makeup gamesWe hope that our nail salon games are what you want and you will write in your comments your opinion about how  we can make them as you like. Enjoy playing !

Now your dreams came true and you have a big and complete beauty makeup salon and there you can prove your makeup artist skills and transform your favorite doll in a gorgeous princess. In the beginning she needs a beauty treatment of her skin, a stunning makeup with beautiful colors, some pretty blouses and necklaces and at the end a pretty manicure with gorgeous patterns for her nails.

description: Play as a whale shark games in massive sea and kill hungry sharks or bull shark from shark games with ultimate sniper guns. Bigger the shark, bigger the gun you will need in order to save the last line of defense against attacking crazy sharks, blue whale or angry shark along with tiger shark from animal games. Unlike any other adventure, this shark sniper shooting quest will provide you true adrenaline in a virtual world. This is one of the different whale shark simulator game & blue whale simulator game in which you will kill all the bloody whale sharks or tiger sharks along with hammerhead shark or sea monster with US army Sniper Shooter guns.Don’t fear from the scary jaws of a shark from whale games , just shoot or snipe with sniper 3d or sniper shooter skills from hunting games to kill bull shark with sniper rifle and achieve your objective in this shark hunting game. Target white, blue along with tiger shark and black sharks with killer whale simulator or blue whale simulator along realistic orca simulator as trained sniper shooter or shark hunter and do not let brutal shark get closer to you. Kill all the sharks one by one with each critical strike and prove that you are a true shark killer and sniper hunter.This is your ultimate chance to become the legendary shark sniper shooter. Use single bullet and hunt the biggest sea hunters or vicious sea monsters along bull shark in the most challenging shark sniper shooter games and earn your respect in sniper fury. Deadly hammerhead shark or crazy sharks and tiger shark will attack you instant-kill shark attack in under water. Using your experience as a top sniper killer or american sniper from fps game, save innocent people from angry shark in the amazing underwater shark world. Features of Underwater Shark Sniper Hunter: • Ultimate Sniper Assassin Shooting game Experience designed for underwater animal hunter.• Smooth and Easy Controls for saving yourself from sudden shark attack• Missions to Become Shark Hunter from hunting games• Multiple snipe Guns for Shark Hunting• Realistic Angry Shark Games

description: In this terrifying map for Minecraft you have a unique possibility not only to find yourself in the unusual and creepy world of the popular horror-game, but to play for one of its characters too. If you’re ready to test your nerves, download our new MCPE map for free and imagine yourself a hero of the famous horror-game!In this map for Minecraft you can choose a character, for whom you want to play, and you can a choice of four main heroes: Bendy, Boris, Joe and Henry. As soon as you make a decision, you will get a chest with different unusual things, which will be definitely very useful during the game. Each hero of this map for MCPE has its own plotline and, that’s why things in the chest are completely different, because every character will face special dangers and numerous obstacles. But, nevertheless, no matter whom will you choose, each of this four characters of this exciting map for Minecraft has to go through the maze, avoiding treacherous traps and creepy places, in order to save his/her life and find the way out of this dangerous place. Except this main aim, every character has their own special tasks, which you need to complete too. All action in this map for Minecraft is going on the dark wooden maze, consisting of numerous mazy corridors, cells and creepy places. If you’re not scared, and you’re ready to dive into terrifying world of Bendy and his friends, download our new map for Minecraft for free, and try to survive in this dangerous world of horror-game!You will need to install Minecraft Pocket Edition on your mobile device for this map.DISCLAIMER: This map for MCPE isn’t made or supported by Mojang. Minecraft and Minecraft Pocket Edition are official trademarks of Mojang AB. The developers of this MCPE map don’t cooperate with Mojang. This application fully adheres to the terms set up by Mojang AB. More info at https://account.mojang.com/terms.

description: Meet the continuation of the game series Survival in the Ocean!You are person who survived after airplane crash in deep ocean. No one around could help you. On the horizon is not visible land. Around only the ocean and hungry sharks.But fortunately, the boxes that were left behind after the plane crash are passing by! You have a hook with you! You can collect these boxes - they can have many useful resources and items. You should watch over your health and at the time of eating. At the top of the screen are indicators of health, satiety and oxygen levels. Take food to replenish your health. You can go fishing and then cook your food at the stake. So you can live longer.Dive into the water - there are many interesting things! Beware of dangerous hungry sharks. Craft a powerful tool in the workbench to protect yourself from sharks. Collect seaweed on the ocean floor, look for hiding places. From algae you can make a very nutritious soup!Make your raft as big as you can! Collect different resources. Use them to craft new items. Use the workbench and oven to open new recipes for craft.Ocean Survival 3D - 2 features:- Ultimate ocean survival simulator- Life on raft- Dangerous underwater world- Easy learning craft system- Optimized graphics- Realistic visual effectsDive into deep ocean, explore underwater world! It's time to survive with Ocean Survival 3D - 2!
descriptionHTML:
Meet the continuation of the game series Survival in the Ocean!
You are person who survived after airplane crash in deep ocean. No one around could help you. On the horizon is not visible land. Around only the ocean and hungry sharks.

But fortunately, the boxes that were left behind after the plane crash are passing by! You have a hook with you! You can collect these boxes - they can have many useful resources and items.

You should watch over your health and at the time of eating. At the top of the screen are indicators of health, satiety and oxygen levels. Take food to replenish your health. You can go fishing and then cook your food at the stake. So you can live longer.

Dive into the water - there are many interesting things! Beware of dangerous hungry sharks. Craft a powerful tool in the workbench to protect yourself from sharks. Collect seaweed on the ocean floor, look for hiding places. From algae you can make a very nutritious soup!

Make your raft as big as you can! Collect different resources. Use them to craft new items. Use the workbench and oven to open new recipes for craft.

Ocean Survival 3D - 2 features:
- Ultimate ocean survival simulator
- Life on raft
- Dangerous underwater world
- Easy learning craft system
- Optimized graphics
- Realistic visual effects

Dive into deep ocean, explore underwater world! It's time to survive with Ocean Survival 3D - 2!
developerAddress:
Shmidta street, 3
Novosibirsk, Russia
recentChanges: - fixed climb on raft from water
- improved graphics - choose Graphics Quality in the Settings
- new visual effects - realistic water and weather
- you can escape - try to find a way out
summary: You on raft. Survive on raft in ocean. Build, craft, use hook, dive and explore!
title: Ocean Survival 3D - 2

comments: Graphics have glitches from time to time.  There's not a whole lot of choices to choose from other than what's being offered.  There are no way of earning diamonds to play the game other than buying them. I'd like to see more ways of earning tickets rather than buying or just waiting for it to regenerate. I'd also love to hear the characters speak.

It is addicting! I love the graphics and how everything plays out! You are always hanging on edge, biting your nails and wondering, 'Whats gonna happen next?' Over all its awesome. Sometimes there are glitches but apart from that 5/5!

This is by far one of the best choices games I think I've ever played the graphics and animation is absolutely second to non, the story so far seems awesome and intriguing. The animation is beautiful and smooth and runs well on my phone. Please never change the way this game is. It gives you the option to buy things but it is very fair to those who can't pay due to money issues so I would definitely recommend this game. The developers should be proud of this game because it really is beautiful designed and made you can tell alot of care and effort went into perfecting this game. It's worth the wait on each episode, I love the stats from other players feature and how you can go back for free to see how different choices would of effect the game differently. All round a very professionally well built game 10 out of 10 wish I could give it more stars it deserves more than 5 :D.
I really like the plots to this game and that it's in Rio. Interesting love story. No matter how much I put Linda with Bruno, she loves Rodrigo.  It's very addictive
I find myself watching the clock for the next episodes. Great app but I wish you would change their wardrobe up. Most especially Marcia's.
It's alright I guess, just need more choices and the music is so not lively but boreing.

comments: Awesome but needs some cool upgrades Its not that the game isnt good, its AMAZING! I love the we bare bears series i watch it every day! The game can be challenging at times but u shd add a hard mode for those who want a challenge. U know the guy in the episode when they worked at the cupcake place? He couldnt decide wut to get. So, u shd add him in the hard mode. After every 15 seconds, he will change his order. Motivating the players to play quickly so he wouldnt change his orders. Plz add this in the game.. keep it up! Like if like idea!

There is alot of work to be done. Advertisements in the middle of game play that force you to start the round over, when I do get through a round the play and back buttons do not work, I have to press the actual back button on my phone to start a new match. I loose all my points/coins after every round and cannot upgrade anything as a result of the memory loss after every round. I love the game but it needs ALOT of work and I can only wonder how this game could be released with so little testing.Droid Turbo

Easy and entertaining Love the we bear bears series. And enjoy the game so much. Just a suggestion maybe there's should ve an option of whice item we want to use after purchased. Cos I bought 2stove but seems like a waste of money cos cant use the old one anymore.

It's okay... Kind of slow... would be fun if we can buy upgrades for the stove (like speed to cook faster)...  And a side to add a plate if we made a mistake/extra food... instead of throwing it away.  Cooking process for me is too slow, compared to other cooking games.  Cute concept though.

I ABSOLUTELY love this game such an amazing way to spend some time or kill time. The game play is great it keeps you on your feet funny. Tons of things you can add to ice bears kitchen. I can't say anymore more on how to describe this game. Cartoon network keep it up!!!.👍

This is a very nice app. We buy things from the shop,we cook them for the customers.....A very good Time pass. Just one thing...there are many adds. Pease remove them then the game will be perfect. Thank you..

descriptionHTML:
Use Ice Bear's awesome cooking skills to serve up some delicious dishes in Stirfry Stunts!

This app is only available in English. Don't worry. It's super fun and doesn't have much text. Have fun!

GRILLIN' AND CHILLIN'
Working the grill at a teppanyaki restaurant is no easy task. You've got to juggle ingredients and orders to satisfy a nonstop rush of hungry customers. Luckily, Ice Bear is the coolest chef around. With him manning the spatulas, everybody will leave happy!

MAKE MAGNIFICENT MEALS
Unlock new foods like shrimp, scallops and lobster to cook your culinary masterpiece. Use more exotic ingredients to increase your multipliers and really rack up the points.

GET HELP FROM YOUR BROS
Call on Grizz and Panda to distract your customers with a little song and dance, giving you more time to perfect your recipes.

BECOME A GRILLMASTER
Upgrade your grill and plates to give you more room to work. Pull out tricks like the classic onion volcano to boost your score sky high.

Get ready to cook up a storm with Ice Bear in STIRFRY STUNTS!

comments: Game is awesome! Butt! It would be better if I could replay my amazing shots lol.  And a better aimer that's not so close to the edge of the screen would be nice. Still a pretty awesome game though,  in my opinion. Probably ridiculously hard for some of you who aren't as good as me but we can't all be pro lmao

Its a great game but the ads on the top of the screen during gameplay aren't cool. It messes with my shots. If you get rid of that I'll give a 5 ☆ rating. I understand that when a game is free the company needs to add ads to make money, but during gameplay on the screen is a little extensive. I don't usually give anything less than five stars,  I'm genuinely sorry. A quick reply would be much appreciated, thanks for your time.

Ruined by ads Well.. I quite liked the game until I finished the first level.. then ads... ads... and more bloody ads... do not get this if you like your game play to be fluid!!!!!  If you like to play a game for 10 seconds then watch 30 seconds of ads every level.. then this game is for you.. I have now uninstalled it.. if I could give minus stars then I would

The same ad ran, after every other level, just too much. I would never dl the advertised game due to it being shoved at me repeatedly. Not much in creativity, a lot of the same scenes just a move of the cup or an added piece. Uninstalled before I get further annoyed.

Fun game, but advertisements are WAAAAAY too frequent to actually enjoy the game (practically every 3rd round). Install if you'd like or don't mind ads all the time, but I didn't make it before deciding to uninstall. Game is absolutely in no way new or ground breaking so you'd be better off with any of the other similar games with far fewer forced ads.

I said if one more add comes up, I'm deleting this game. There is literally a 1 minute add after every single level. This game sucks so bad. I kept my word and uninstalled it. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS. It's not worth it at all.

description: Dinosaur World Craft Exploration:Lite - an exciting game in prehistoric cubic universe where you build, construct, create & craft - using blocks - in world! Dinosaurs (t-rex [tyrannosaurus], triceratops etc.] all around you! This lite pocket mine blocky craft game, inspired by the popular cube & voxel based pocket edition creative games, lets you craft dino world! No dragons and no survival - just prehistoric reptiles! Teenage boys and girls are welcome! Craft & build a perfect cube dinosaurs world! Exploration of world is here! Construct anything you want! Play in a creative mode with unlimited resources or mine deep into the cube dino world.Craft, and explore! Exploration of randomly generated cube prehistoric worlds, islands. Build and create amazing & perfect things from the simplest of homes to the grandest constructions! Start the adventure with “Dino Jurassic Craft Exploration”! This game will bring you only joy and relax! No dragons and survival world craft mode. Just cube jurassic craft world/island and your infinite creativity! Very quick and easy. All for free! This pocket edition (exploration) game contains: block placing, cube world, real time world craft generation. Build a dinosaur world!Craft & Explore the cube world! In this incredible and totally free game you can destroy all the blocks, collect resources, survive and build beautiful & perfect Buildings. This  pocket edition game (PE) contains a large number of different blocks with which you can craft your own cube world/Island! High resolution textures, very convenient and thoughtful game control, High FPS, without compromise! So plunge into the fantastic world of ‘Dino Jurassic Craft: Exploration & Evolution’ - with new cube worlds and adventures! Place blocks / cubes move voxels, dig and mine! Go beyond your wildest dreams, make your own cube jurassic world, mine, castle or city! Great game for adults! And teens! Transform the surface in a 3D environment in Jurassic Jungle! Build shelter, fight, grow and use blocky craft. The only limit is your imagination! Start a cube world craft! Coming soon:MultiplayerCrafting itemsT-Rex defenceBuilding craft modeSurvival exploration modeDay & nightCube blocky craftWorld Craft StorySkyblock free modeStory mode WeatherStats and inventoryDifferent worlds (hell, heaven, lair)If you are interested in similar games such as our cube girl craft world game please see our other games.1. Create & build in a prehistoric times!2. Beware of dinosaurs! T-Rex is here!3. Plunge into a world full of danger

description: Jumping rooftops and chasing after nasty criminals to save the city is what a super hero would do on every day of the week. The adventures of climbing the high buildings, falling like death over the crime evil thugs. Protect city fight crime kill mobster and live like a true superhero. Enemies capture hostage and harass people with their tyranny and criminal advancements. Win greatest battle against them. All the hand to hand combat champions and assassins have mobbed up against the system. Police and cops failed. Too risky to involve military to the city and civilian affairs so the crime fighter spider hero is the ultimate choice to overcome the danger. Opportunity to overcome the crime lords who use the military grade weapons and kill hundreds of people every day. Total warzone neglected by the good cops. Ruined environments with best graphics is extraordinary quality that makes this game a great addition to the action genre gaming. Now the ultimatum by the terrorists to destroy the city halls and kill the people in the streets. To avoid becoming the city a slaughterhouse run by criminals, break their gangs today. Hero adventure is endless pursuit of excitement and adventure.Future battle of mobs and people depends on the spider hero. Crime Fighter Spider Hero is one of the best hero games which features the action like movies. Crime Fighter Spider Hero is in a strange war against the mafia families who occupies lands and properties of the innocent civilians. The cartel and gangs are into some serious evil businesses like narcotics and heroin. Drug trafficking destroying the neighborhood. truly working against the war hero. Chase the crime like a shadow and catch it from the neck. Crime Fighter Spider Hero Special features:•	Control territory and make the villains vanish in no time. •	Beat the crap out of thugs and mobsters to teach them a lesson.•	Positive storyline of the game. •	Enthralling and smooth gameplay to deliver the crime story of the city.•	Punish criminal agents and help the citizens survive the battle.•	Use the super power for a positive purpose and bring justice•	Beat the invincible crime cults and anarchy promoters.•	Outlaws in disguise of the common people in the streets are your major target.•	Fearless attacks on the enemies•	Crime lords are striking with a really big arsenalDownload the Crime Fighter Spider Hero free and enjoy applying martial arts against the worst criminals. Enemy is unaware of your powers so strike them with a surprise. Destroy their organizations before the eye blinks. Leave the opponents with nothing but devastation, regret and death bodies of their fellow criminal’s master minds. From heroes to the worst convicts and prisoners, all the graphics and the sounds added in the game are perfect. Diverse characteristics in the animation of each character is fascinating. Monster criminals has a strong alliance with the corrupt government officials built on the base of bribery and extortion of their family members. Defend the city behind lines against the brutal savage criminal minds who have methods of mass destruction and public harassment. Terror is the tool to control the people in view of the destroyers.

comments: Amazing, great! I loooooved it!! I only just installed this and am already in love with it. Awesome job cocoplay and tabtale!! (Just please make some things free. It kinda gets annoying when you have to pay for every single dress, top, etc etc )

This game is amazing after a while you start to get the hang of it. I would totally recommend it to others. If youre not so keen just try it. At first i wasnt so keen then i actually downloaded it and i loved it. And now im here writing this!!
I think it is amazing. I have not had a problem  out of  it. It's a great time passer. The only bad thing about it is you need interent for some stuff. I will reamed  it to all of my friends.😀😊☺💓💗💝💟💞

I really liked this game but after a week of playing this game when I was going to put make up on the model I couldn't put anything on her it said that I needed to  BUY the full version? What ? Please fix this problem because my WiFi is on but it's still locked
To many ads and the controls are horrible! So difficult to apply makeup or dye hair, also dont like that you automatically buy things! Should be able to try things on to see if you even want them...

Theres an ad every 5 to 8 seconds. Loved the game, i thought it was very fun but i went crazy with ads. Plus after the fifth girl the game locks you out of a ton products (clothes, makeup, colors, hair, etc) unless you pay for it. Not fair i felt since you already had to buy it with your game cash. So now youre short on cash but cant access anything you bought. All in all. Im deleting it bc the ads killed about half the time i spent playing.
description: If you’re into makeover games, this one will knock your socks off. And if you’re not into makeover games, this one will change that! You’re the hottest new fashion stylist girl in Hollywood, and your awesome reputation is already bringing you fame and fortune! Dress up famous fashion models and VIP celebrities. Bring out their star style and give them beautiful makeovers! Create tons of incredible looks for your clients - find them the perfect outfits for their big events - they’ll love their new hot tops, skirts, shoes and accessories!Welcome to Hollywood - the land of VIPs, where fashion rules and all the celebrities and famous models need to look amazing to keep up their star status! That’s where you come in - you're the stylist to the stars! Everyone’s talking about the hot looks you created at the latest red carpet event (that skirt Angie J. wore - AMAZING!), and now all the girls are piling in to your stylist office for fashion makeovers! Dress up these girls and make them over, in this most fabulous of all makeover games!Features:> You’re the next big thing - stylist girl to the stars! Open up your very own Hollywood stylist office and become famous! Makeover games are the perfect way to perfect your star style.> Style and dress up your VIP clients (supermodels, famous movie stars and more!) in glamorous outfits - once you choose the perfect top and skirt, add gorgeous accessories to finish off the look!> From magazine cover shoots to red carpet movie premieres, it’s your job to give your clients makeovers that will help them wow the crowds!> Dress up your models in fabulous clothes (dresses, skirts, shoes, pants and more) at the trendiest stores - Chick Shack, Party Fever and Stardust, and add perfect accessories to complete their outfits!> Help your clients get the prettiest makeovers the world has ever seen!> No makeover is complete without a mani! Make sure their nails are perfect - add cool stickers and nail jewels, and complement their manicures with rings and bracelets! > To make it in show business, stunning hair is key! Get your celebrity models killer new hairstyles!> Reach #1 in the Top Stylist charts, gain followers and likes!> Help your models win lots of fashion catwalk and photoshoot contests! The judges will adore the skirts and shoes you dressed them in!> Play fun fashion girl and stylist minigames! > Collect coins as you style and dress up. Makeover games are so much fun!ABOUT Coco PlayCoco Play Limited is China-based developer of creative and unique apps for kids. Founded in 2013, Coco Play provides rich 3D simulation-based games for the whole family. Coco Play is a subsidiary of TabTale, a leading, global creator of innovative games, interactive books and educational apps.Visit us: http://www.tabtale.com/ Like us: http://www.facebook.com/TabTaleFollow us:@TabTaleWatch us: http://www.youtube.com/TabtaleCONTACT US Let us know what you think! Questions? Suggestions? Technical Support? Contact us 24/7 at WeCare@TabTale.com.IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR PARENTS: * This App is free to play but certain in-game items may require payment. You may restrict in-app purchases by disabling them on the device.* By downloading and/or using this App, you agree to TabTale’s Privacy Policy and Terms of Use at http://tabtale.com/privacy-policy/ and at http://tabtale.com/terms-of-use/.   Please consider that this App may include third parties services for limited legally permissible purposes. For further information please refer to TabTale’s Privacy Policy.

If you’re into makeover games, this one will knock your socks off. And if you’re not into makeover games, this one will change that!

You’re the hottest new fashion stylist girl in Hollywood, and your awesome reputation is already bringing you fame and fortune! Dress up famous fashion models and VIP celebrities. Bring out their star style and give them beautiful makeovers! Create tons of incredible looks for your clients - find them the perfect outfits for their big events - they’ll love their new hot tops, skirts, shoes and accessories!

Welcome to Hollywood - the land of VIPs, where fashion rules and all the celebrities and famous models need to look amazing to keep up their star status! That’s where you come in - you're the stylist to the stars! Everyone’s talking about the hot looks you created at the latest red carpet event (that skirt Angie J. wore - AMAZING!), and now all the girls are piling in to your stylist office for fashion makeovers! Dress up these girls and make them over, in this most fabulous of all makeover games!

Features:
> You’re the next big thing - stylist girl to the stars! Open up your very own Hollywood stylist office and become famous! Makeover games are the perfect way to perfect your star style.
> Style and dress up your VIP clients (supermodels, famous movie stars and more!) in glamorous outfits - once you choose the perfect top and skirt, add gorgeous accessories to finish off the look!
> From magazine cover shoots to red carpet movie premieres, it’s your job to give your clients makeovers that will help them wow the crowds!
> Dress up your models in fabulous clothes (dresses, skirts, shoes, pants and more) at the trendiest stores - Chick Shack, Party Fever and Stardust, and add perfect accessories to complete their outfits!
> Help your clients get the prettiest makeovers the world has ever seen!
> No makeover is complete without a mani! Make sure their nails are perfect - add cool stickers and nail jewels, and complement their manicures with rings and bracelets!
> To make it in show business, stunning hair is key! Get your celebrity models killer new hairstyles!
> Reach #1 in the Top Stylist charts, gain followers and likes!
> Help your models win lots of fashion catwalk and photoshoot contests! The judges will adore the skirts and shoes you dressed them in!
> Play fun fashion girl and stylist minigames!
> Collect coins as you style and dress up. Makeover games are so much fun!

ABOUT Coco Play
Coco Play Limited is China-based developer of creative and unique apps for kids. Founded in 2013, Coco Play provides rich 3D simulation-based games for the whole family. Coco Play is a subsidiary of TabTale, a leading, global creator of innovative games, interactive books and educational apps.
