description: Splash of Fun Coloring Game is a game that gives you the option to have fun with traditional painting tools like paints, crayons or felt pens. Kids, together with their parents, can create their own little masterpieces, creating similar effects to the ones acquired on paper. The game was created with the youngest in mind (tested on two- and three-year-olds), but older kids and grown-ups will also have lots of color-splashing fun here.We can play in the following way: - we color pre-prepared images selected from the library,- or we create our own "masterpieces" using provided painting supplies.Little kids will find here many pictures to color with a bucket tool that fills large areas at once. Older kids and adults can try drawing their own creatures and scenes, and color them with a wash of paint, crayon or spray paint. We can also add highlights and shadows, correct mistakes with eraser, use undo and redo functionality or change the size of our preferred coloring tool.We can pick colors from two color palettes: - basic (18 colors)- extended - over 200 colors.The images are grouped in the following categories:- for girls,- dinosaurs, animals and nature,- fruit and vegetables,- underwater,- vehicles.Additional features:- save your own projects and return to them later on,- share your saved images through e-mail or on Facebook,- return to the project you're working on whenever you want,- listen to the pleasant music in the background (with an option to turn it off).
descriptionHTML:
Splash of Fun Coloring Game is a game that gives you the option to have fun with traditional painting tools like paints, crayons or felt pens. Kids, together with their parents, can create their own little masterpieces, creating similar effects to the ones acquired on paper. The game was created with the youngest in mind (tested on two- and three-year-olds), but older kids and grown-ups will also have lots of color-splashing fun here.

We can play in the following way:
- we color pre-prepared images selected from the library,
- or we create our own "masterpieces" using provided painting supplies.
Little kids will find here many pictures to color with a bucket tool that fills large areas at once. Older kids and adults can try drawing their own creatures and scenes, and color them with a wash of paint, crayon or spray paint. We can also add highlights and shadows, correct mistakes with eraser, use undo and redo functionality or change the size of our preferred coloring tool.

We can pick colors from two color palettes:
- basic (18 colors)
- extended - over 200 colors.

The images are grouped in the following categories:
- for girls,
- dinosaurs, animals and nature,
- fruit and vegetables,
- underwater,
- vehicles.

Additional features:
- save your own projects and return to them later on,
- share your saved images through e-mail or on Facebook,
- return to the project you're working on whenever you want,
- listen to the pleasant music in the background (with an option to turn it off).
developerAddress:
Roweckiego-Grota 3E
42-224 Częstochowa
summary: Kids coloring games with the option to create their own images.
title: Splash of Fun Coloring Game

descriptionHTML:
Become a horse owner in our new animal simulator! Raise and groom an entire horse herd on your farm and see if it fits for survival in the wild. Horse Stable: Herd Care Simulator if full of animals adventures and funny stuff to do with your horse herd!

Horse Stable: Herd Care Simulator features:

>YOUR OWN HORSE HERD - create a unique horse, make a family and raise foals

>REALISTIC ANIMAL CARE - wash and feed your horse and foal, to keep them happy

>OPEN WORLD ADVENURES - explore big world, meet humans, wild animals and other horses

>LOTS OF ACTIVITES - complete quests, take part in horse racing and do other stuff

Customize a horse!
You can choose breed, color, gender and name for your horse, and try to take care of a horse you create! And after that complete quests and fight enemies to make your horse and herd stronger in the animal simulator. A horse herd life is fascinating, experience it in our animal simulator!

Take care of a herd!
Once your horse strong enough, you can star a herd and explore the world together - horse is a herding animal! Groom your foals, level up your horse herd to make a bigger herd in the animal simulator. And don’t forget to wash, feed and play with your horse!

Explore open world!
There’s a lot to do in the animals life simulator, so explore the world with your herd! Interesting quests, wild animals and picturesque locations are waiting - explore the world of the simulator with your horse herd and find them all!

Try living with a horse herd in Horse Stable: Herd Care Simulator - a captivating animals life simulator!

description: Prepare yourself for a battle unlike any other when you enter the 3D world of Rescue Robots Survival Games. Constant challenges await you in this fast-paced game where you must overcome every obstacle and overpower every enemy in your quest to dominate the playing field. Unlock an arsenal of powerful army-grade weapons as you progress. Use your ammo wisely and take care of your health as an onslaught of enemies are poised to strike around every corner. It is up to you to save the blocky universe from a mass invasion.After the nations outlaw nuclear, biological and chemical weapons, the military develops a new way to obliterate enemies: thousand-foot robots. The mechanical marvels work wonders, until it becomes discovered that these automatons can use raw materials from the world around them to build duplicates of themselves. Suddenly these robots where were once allies, have turned on the humans and now a new war rages. The government has called upon their every reserve and still these new enemies have refused defeat, wreaking havoc on the cities of the world.You are the world's last hope– you, the engineer who brought these monsters to life. Only you know the secret to triumph over these deadly droids. Avenging your fallen comrades, you embark on an epic journey to protect your planet from these foes and the take-over they plot. This will be no easy task, it will take all of your skills, lightning fast reflexes and quick thinking to battle your way to victory. Expect hard hitting fights and double the action as you tear through waves of enemy bots in this addictive combination running and action-shooting combat game where survival is everything. Prepare yourself, this FPS showdown is about to begin.

comments: Unless you have 16 hrs a day to put into this game to learn the track you will never have a very high score. Sometimes your vehicle doesnt respond the same as other runs also you may land on your tail and survive and the next time you die its up and down with the control if you keep going or die. And sometimes it tries to flip when you try to take off resulting in a quick death

Would and will give 5 star. But would like to see a gem counter. It gets rather tough keeping count.  Also I noticed sometimes that when come across the areas that have the 4-5 flat spiked walls that you have to time just right. When I die and revive they all seem to sync up together making it impossible to go under. I'll try and screenshot it next time. All in all great job and awesome game. Maybe a custom map feature for future. Possibly added to the no ads fee. Would be worth it then.

This game is my favorite game ever. The graphics are amazing, the controls are great. I can't seem to find anything wrong with this game. Me and my brother love playing it. I also like that it is available on Google Play Store and the Appstore on iPhones. My old phone was an iPhone, and when I got my new phone I was worried that I wouldn't be able to play it, but thanks to Ketchapp and Google Play Store, I can still play it!! Also, I would like to suggest that you add a feature that allows you to create your own level, but it's not something you have to add, it's just something I think would make the game absolutely perfect for me. Then again, you may already have that feature and I haven't seen it/gotten to it yet. Anyway, it's an amazing game, and I hope Ketchapp keeps making amazing games like this!!! (BTW, Ketchapp games are my absolute FAV.) Thank you!! 🚘😊🚘

This game would be great if it wasn't so laggy. Usually I would think it was an issue with phone storage or something, but I am on a new phone (note 8) and have only added a few apps in total. The game was smooth the first day or two but now the speed changes throughout play. The levels become impossible because the clock doesn't slow down even though the movement of the bike does.   Great concept and design. Hopefully that can be figured out if it is an issue on their side.

The game is great fun. I have been playing it for a few months and actually still play it. The only problem i seem to have with it. Is the laggish performance when i am connected to internet. The moment the internet is off then game runs more smoothly other than that. Still enjoy playing it. Though I must say it would be nice if there was a gem counter for each ride so i know how many I have collected. Otherwise great game

Love it. Only thing is there is a glitch when you watch an ad for 200 thingy things you get a menu that lets you get 200 more. Than again, than again. Its better on our side than yours but it would be a good fox so you have to earn them! I love all your games, wish I had all of them but I have limited storage!

comments: I love that you don't lose troops while defending. The only problem is the cost to heal them is rediculous. There are many aggressive players that assault you early on in the game and unless you pay money it becomes difficult to maintain a stable civilization. I believe it would be better if there were cheaper or easier ways to gain resources for those whom don't pay to win. Thank you for the amazing game though! Love you guys and I will never quit playing!

The admins take too long to respond. Do not waste any money in this game. They took my account away when I switched phones and its been over a week. Meanwhile, all my troops got destroyed and my game is ruined. And I've spent over $60 real money. You would think they'd take care of a money spender but no. They just ghosted me.

I like the game but there is some bullying that happens. No limit on how many times a player can attack you. I was attacked 60 times in an hour by the same player killing every troop I had, cleaning out all my resources and destroyed one of my bases. It is just plain malicious. I have brought it up before and no one cares to do anything to fix it.  Update: I sent the above message months ago and received no response. This is classic "pay-to-play" tactics that promote bullying to get you to pay for upgrades. I won't be playing anymore.

I like the game. Has a few things that are a pain though. Like you cant share resources if they were bought, what does that even matter. I also dont like that your avatar can only be your facebook pic or an in game one..give me the option to upload my own pic without changing my facebook one.

Very unbalanced.  Dominated by purple, orange, and blue hordes. If you start as any other horde color you will be raided constantly with no support. Be prepared to spend lots of money on peace shields...

I don't understand the hype. 5 minutes into it and was already waiting an hour for an upgrade. No activities or anything else to do. One last thing, you only start with a 24 hour peace shield... n I'm out.

comments: This is overall the best golf game I have come across or any app, in general, relating to sports. My only problem is that sometimes people do not want to, not do not have the ability to create a facebook account. I wish there would be a way to play with your family; without the facebook account users perks.

I like the game, and it's addictive, but the mechanics are absolutely flawed. There have been tons of instances where the game has unfairly screwed me or other player's over. 1. Places mystery boxes in front of the player who drives second, but not the first player. 2. Hills like to stop a ball, that is being shot full force by an iron club, in it's tracks. 3. The swinging spike balls only affect some players golf balls, but not others.  Things like this piss people off, because they expect the game to be fair. Those small things easily aid a player in losing a match.

This game would be awesome if it matched you with people equal to your level but it doesn't. So I spend more time trying to get to the higher levels and not able to upgrade equipment. Of course you could always purchase money but I'm not big on doibg that!

Game cheats, puts you against lower lol players with better equipment who make ungodly shots, or much higher level where you don't have a chance. I hit things that aren't there, and with a crossword my ball will fly into the wind with no action. Opponent Always get better wind and direction, and will outshoot you work lower equipmeny.

I love the game I find it very entertaining. I also like being able to interact globally. But the only one thing that I would change, would be to make the analog where you pull back your driver smaller screened devices. Besides that I have no complaints. I love the game! 😊😊
The game doesnt allow you to get a proper pull back on your swing. To much clutter on some stages. Plus those who play too win always beat those who dont
description: Join the most exciting multiplayer Golf ever! Challenge players all over the world!Not just golf. This is action-packed Mini Golf with full of adventures and thrills you've never experienced before!Play on gorgeous courses against golfers around the globe in real-time online matches! Start your epic tour in the quest to be the next Mini Golf King!★★ Download Mini Golf King - Multiplayer Game for free NOW! ★★KEY FEATURES - Exciting Mini Golf duel in real-time online multiplayer. - Simple and intuitive control: Swipe and release to strike! - Compete against players from all around the world to take their coins and trophies! - Play on 35+ beautiful golf courses with tons of dynamic tricks and fun. - Unlock chests to discover powerful new golf equipment and upgrade existing ones: drivers, irons, sand wedges, putters, balls and gloves! - Progress through more advanced stages all the way to the top. - Get promoted in the weekly leagues to win chests and card bonus. - Conquer three tournament rounds, take mega prizes and be the golf champion! - Sink every putt and get special rewards in Hole-in-One Challenge! - Connect with Facebook to send and request free gifts! - Play online matches with your family and friends!* "Like" Mini Golf King on Facebook for updates and news! https://www.facebook.com/theMiniGolfKing/* You need an internet connection to play this game.* Optional Permissions - Contacts: Used to verify your Google account in the login process.  - Phone: Used to check your connection status to the game.  - Storage: Used to save and load game configurations and caches* How to turn permissions on or off - Android OS 6.0 or later: On your device, open the main "Settings" app. Tap "Apps"(or "Application Manager"). descriptionHTML:
Join the most exciting multiplayer Golf ever! Challenge players all over the world!
Not just golf. This is action-packed Mini Golf with full of adventures and thrills you've never experienced before!

Play on gorgeous courses against golfers around the globe in real-time online matches! Win and collect trophies to unlock top stages. Discover and upgrade golf clubs, balls and gloves to customize your gameplay. Take on the weekly leaderboard and tournament to win awesome prizes and glory. Do amazing trickshots in Hole in One Challenge. You can also play together with your Facebook friends!

Firing your shot is easier than ever. Just drag and release to hit the ball like playing pool! Aim and shoot carefully to collect the most gems while taking the fastest route to the hole. You can even clash your ball against your rival's to take out their gems! Arcade Mini Golf has never been this quick and fun!

Putt your way through wonders. Golfers' wildest dreams finally come true! Let's ride tube slides, swing on drawbridges, jump over pyramids, explore mazes with bomb traps, and reach farther and fly higher with accelerators and jump pads! Taking advantage of all the tricks while honing your skills is the key to victory!

So if you want to relax with a nice PvP game which is easy to pick up, instantly addicting and hard to master, this will be the best game for you. Start your epic tour in the quest to be the next Mini Golf King!

★★ Download Mini Golf King - Multiplayer Game for free NOW! ★★

KEY FEATURES
- Exciting Mini Golf duel in real-time online multiplayer.
- Simple and intuitive control: Swipe and release to strike!
- Compete against players from all around the world to take their coins and trophies!
- Play on 35+ beautiful golf courses with tons of dynamic tricks and fun.
- Unlock chests to discover powerful new golf equipment and upgrade existing ones: drivers, irons, sand wedges, putters, balls and gloves!
- Progress through more advanced stages all the way to the top.
- Get promoted in the weekly leagues to win chests and card bonus.
- Conquer three tournament rounds, take mega prizes and be the golf champion!
- Sink every putt and get special rewards in Hole-in-One Challenge!
- Connect with Facebook to send and request free gifts!
- Play online matches with your family and friends!

* "Like" Mini Golf King on Facebook for updates and news!
https://www.facebook.com/theMiniGolfKing/

* You need an internet connection to play this game.

* Optional Permissions
- Contacts: Used to verify your Google account in the login process.
- Phone: Used to check your connection status to the game.
- Storage: Used to save and load game configurations and caches

* How to turn permissions on or off
- Android OS 6.0 or later: On your device, open the main "Settings" app. Tap "Apps"(or "Application Manager"). Tap "Mini Golf King". Tap "Permissions". Move switches to the right or the left to turn the permissions on or off.
- Android OS earlier than 6.0: You need to upgrade the OS to control each permission. Otherwise you may uninstall "Mini Golf King" app to revoke them as a whole.

comments: Is it just me or does this happen to everyone? When I use a power up like 2X or instant bingo, does it land on the same number? I had an "instant bingo" land on B9 on three different cards (B9 was never called)! Same with most power ups! Just curious!!!

Everything would be pretty neat, but there should be another way to get more tickets. I've been stuck at the New York state for several days now, cause I can only replay the first stages with the tickets from the daily bonus.
Love it. The only reason I didn't give 5's across the board is it gets costly per game as you gain levels. The games are way fun and you can play up to 8 cards !!!!!

There should be more ways to get or win more tickets and power-ups. I also think the costs per cards increases too much from board to board. Other than those two issues, I love this game. Would play more if there were other ways to get/win tickets, the purchase costs is ridiculous for the middle/working-class.  I'd rather pay my bills than buy fake in-game tickets that CAN'T win me REAL CASH. Thank you keep up the good work.
It's a fun game. You have to be quick near the end beacause the game seem to end while the caller is still calling the last number. You don't get a penalty for daubing the wrong number.

Okay, I play these games when I wake up and this one costs a fortune to play!!! Then, I have found with the challenges it doesnt give you credit as it should for utilizing the power ups you bought. I just used two for a challenge, and it never registered. If youre willing to dump money this is the ideal game  Oh and you cant reach support through the app to discuss these mistakes so....youre SOL when the game messes up. After spending oodles on this game, time to delete.

descriptionHTML:
■ Survival mode unlocked!
■ New items, stages and zombies!
■ Adjusted difficulty level.

■ Synopsis
Once an ordinary man, Peter is left to survive in midst of a zombie apocalypse. As he fights against them, his strength and skill grows.
Your job is simple - survive.

■ Features
Kill zombies and collect Gold to upgrade teammates and various installations - to kill more zombies!

Simply tap to fire your gun.
Your tapping speed determines the firing speed.

Hire teammates to increase chance of survival in this world of despair.

Experience this simple, yet strategic game!

■ Info
You can use auto-fire when you reach a certain level.
There are various skills that can save you from critical situation.
Every teammate has different weapons, with unique attributes.
Kill zombies for Gold. Use the Gold to upgrade teammates and maintain the camp.
Offensive or deffensive? It all depends on your choice.
As days pass zombies become stronger, and they will become even more powerful during night time.
Collect various inventory items for additional strength.
It's a good idea to check the type of item each Boss yields.
Mine is a very powerful weapon with devastating damage.
When barricade is breached, zombies can attack your teammates.
Nuke will restart the game, but you'll keep inventory items.
When you have an inventory item, obtain another identical item to upgrade it.
If the game is too hard, try again from the start with your inventory items by using Nuke.
There's a massive Last Boss waiting for you.

■ This game saves player data in device. Deleting the app will terminate all save data.

I do not mind throwing some money at a well developed game that deserves it, but you never win anything in return. Just want you to keep spending. Such a shame, love several of the slot games.

It's a great game if you have loads to spend. Buy coins, and it eats them up. Very frustrating as the slots are fun to play. Needs to give better wins so you feel like you have a chance. Will not buy any more so will only get to play once in a while now on the minimal free coins.

Small payout compared to size spent, not enough action. Not fun when all you do is get rolled. Nice slots though if your willing to pay up.
Money sucking app from hell! Slot winning payout set ridiculously low so that you are forced to purchase coins to make this game playable and fun. Not cool! Stay away!!

Edit 3 update: I have reported the developer to Google, it's been over a week without a reply after being ripped off during the " minimum x3 wheel event" good luck getting support after you have purchased and something goes wrong, these leeches won't be getting another cent from me.  Edit 2 Bought $19.99 coin pack during "guaranteed 3x wheel event" only received 2x on wheel, currently have a ticket open with support, if not rectified will be reporting to google. comments: My partner is awesome and it doesn't out Trump you or play like a suicide bomber either. Tried the rest but this is the best for free guys. Awesome job. Asthetics is good and simple. Be great if you could put a 'speed slider' dial to slow gameplay down, so as my young master can play whilst learning. Superb guys n gals. This one is definitely worth trying. Beats Zelda's 'free game' she, wants to Trump you out most times.

Love this game! I've read lots of reviews and they kind of surprised me. This game seems to me to pretty accurately reflect Euchre when we play at home. Good hands, bad hands, balances out pretty evenly in the end. We don't use the "Going Under" feature, but it would sure be a help if you are stuck with at least 3 9s&10s to be able to switch with the pile!✔ The gold circle with the D in it indicates the dealer. The Trump suit is put beside the player who called Trump. Fast, easy, fun!

Bots call Trump when they can't even take 2 tricks, so I'm constantly getting set or setting the other team. It's nice for practice to get use to thinking out probabilities, but that all goes out the window when a bot leads out with the 10 of trump on the first play. Bot logic needs a lot of help to make it realistic.

This game was and is great. I am not a big fan of the constant 5 second ads now though. I understand it is a free app that needs to be supported by ads but it is after every round now  I and I am losing interest because it takes too long to  I play now. I hope you get it sorted out though. Whenever my right calls Bauer and I lead with an offsuit Ace,they NEVER ever have that suit. If I am making it,that same Opponent to my right ALWAYS has an offsuit ace as the stopper . Becoming too predictable in that way. Also,I have never played euchre in real life where you order up your partner and they play too.

Nice Very cool.  Am using it to teach my teenage children the game :)  on the downside - it's not often I'm dealt a decent hand.  N sometimes my partner stuffs up big time (like what were they thinking) :) but then again so do I lol.

The A-I makes it impossible to win unless you play on easy mode. Table talk is an understatement...the cpu gets at least 5 viable loaner hands every game on medium or above and the partners always have just the right cards available. Not random at all and no skill required. Let the players play and don't load the cpu's hand every hand. Ugh
description: Euchre is a classic trick taking card game, similar to Hearts and Spades. It's widely played in the United States, where it's also known as Bacon, and in other English speaking countries. In Euchre Free: Classic Card Game you play with 3 other players, forming 2 teams, and the deck in play consists of the 9, 10, J, Q, K and A cards. There is always a trump and your objective is to score 10 or more points. You get these points in matches with 5 tricks, where the team that scores the most points and tricks wins.In Euchre Free: Classic Card Game, you play just like in real life, choosing between accepting the trump, passing or changing your cards, playing the match with your partner or going alone. Play the best cards and use the trumps wisely to win the tricks.Features:- 3 difficulty levels: choose between easy, medium and hard.- Customize the cards from the deck and the table.- Autosave: restart the game from where you stopped.- Statistics with your performance in the game.- 100% free game, with unlimited matches.If you like card games like Hearts, Spades, 500 and other trick taking card games, you will love Euchre!Download Euchre Free: Classic Card Game now and get ready for hours of fun with this classic card game. And don’t get euchred!
descriptionHTML:
Euchre is a classic trick taking card game, similar to Hearts and Spades. It's widely played in the United States, where it's also known as Bacon, and in other English speaking countries. In Euchre Free: Classic Card Game you play with 3 other players, forming 2 teams, and the deck in play consists of the 9, 10, J, Q, K and A cards. There is always a trump and your objective is to score 10 or more points. You get these points in matches with 5 tricks, where the team that scores the most points and tricks wins.

In Euchre Free: Classic Card Game, you play just like in real life, choosing between accepting the trump, passing or changing your cards, playing the match with your partner or going alone. Play the best cards and use the trumps wisely to win the tricks.

Features:

- 3 difficulty levels: choose between easy, medium and hard.
- Customize the cards from the deck and the table.
- Autosave: restart the game from where you stopped.
- Statistics with your performance in the game.
- 100% free game, with unlimited matches.

If you like card games like Hearts, Spades, 500 and other trick taking card games, you will love Euchre!

Download Euchre Free: Classic Card Game now and get ready for hours of fun with this classic card game. And don’t get euchred!

description: Our lovely girl is getting married! She has dreamed about her wedding day since she was a little girl and now the moment has finally come. Enter one of the most elegant wedding games and help the bride and bridesmaids prepare for this special event.Getting ready for a wedding is not easy, it requires some effort and fashion sense. Our wedding game for girls has 4 levels, discover all the things you can do! The bride is going to be the center of attention, you should start with her! Enter the makeup salon and try on lovely shades of lipstick, eyeshadow, eyeliner and mascara. Create a delicate makeup look for the bride to be! After that, visit the hair salon and make sure she gets the perfect hairstyle.The most important part of a bride look is the dress. Enter the wedding dress up level and choose carefully. The dressing room is filled with all types of amazing wedding gowns and you can try all of them before you decide which one looks best on the sweet girl. Whatever you like, you will find it at the wedding fashion salon. Don't forget to pick a nice flower bouquet and a bride veil.The bridesmaids will also need a fashion adviser, don't forget to play dress up with them too. You can pick matching outfits or completely different clothes for each girl. Even though the bride is the most important person at the wedding, the bridesmaids will also need to shine. Do your best as a wedding stylist!Classy Wedding Salon game features:💐 a gorgeous bride and 3 bridesmaids💐 makeup, hair and dress up game levels💐 wedding themed makeup, hairstyles and clothing items (dresses, blouses, skirts and lots of accessories)💐 girly graphics and intuitive gameplay💐 free to play wedding game💐 fun and safe for little girls💐 no wifi gameThe wedding will start soon and these lovely girls need you! Join them right away in one of the most amazing wedding games. Do the bride's makeup, style her hair and find the perfect wedding dress. Then, explore different fashion options with the 3 bridesmaids. You will never get bored of this game for girls, give it a chance and let the fun begin!

description: 6 girl friends have graduated from high school and enrolled at college /university. Don't be decieved by their geeky glasses and brackets: these intelligent girls are still fashionistas in their hearts! These young smart women now officially preparing for their future career in business, social or STEM fields. At the same time, they are having the greatest time in thier lives! No pesky parents around, lots of new friends, first love, romance, crazy parties, and some cash to upgrade their wardrobes! They're lucky to have some rich parents who bought an apartment as present for their 18th birthday, and one of them even inherited a mid-size hotel business, so nothing stands in the way of their happiness and enjoyment of life!Pick one of 6 cute dolls of different races and assemble an outfit for each doll in different styles: informal, formal, business casual, geek-style, fancy, classy or other. Pick hairstyles, accessories, tops, jackets, skirts, jeans and more. Over 160 items in the game. There are no locks on anything, you can't spend any real money here. It's all free - a virtual fashionista's paradise and a sandbox for an aspiring fashion designer.We've got more makeover & beauty games, also about highschool ("High School Dress Up"). Download and play our Android games free, without in-app purchases! We publish new dressup & cosplay apps frequently. Just check "More by Games For Girls" link and start styling.

description: Lose yourself in the mysterious Elven Wonderland as you play solitaire across beautiful maps filled with magic, wonder and lots of interesting creatures! Explore the Elven Woods and beyond! The Elven Wonderland is full of amazing, mystical places. From the Elven Woods to the Frozen Lakes, you’ll have over 75 levels of solitaire to enjoy as you embark on a quest across each land. Every month, the solitaire story is expanded with brand new exciting maps and levels – so keep checking back for new updates!A classic card game with a magical twistBringing the fun of solitaire to your smartphone – with a sprinkle of Elven magic – you’ll have hours of fun playing this relaxing single player card game. Just clear the piles of cards on the screen by selecting the card one value up or down from the card shown at the bottom of the screen. When you clear all the cards, you win!Daily tasks & lots of free bonuses!The Elven Wonderland is full of treasures and generous creatures who love to help you on your solitaire quest! Each day the wood elves will give you a list of tasks to earn extra coins, complete these tasks every day for huge rewards. Don’t want to complete tasks? You’ve been given a magical bowl that fills up with coins slowly for you to empty every day! If that wasn’t enough, you can replay each level to earn even more coins! ============================Solitaire Quest – Highlights============================• A fun, relaxing single player card game• Play solitaire across beautifully designed maps across Fairy Wonderland• Over 75 levels with more added each month• Unique elements in each level such as golden and locked cards• Daily tasks – complete them for huge free rewards• Empty the coin globe each day for free coins• Spend your coins to unlock new, unique card sets and styles• Get useful power ups to help on your solitaire quest• Play solitaire offline – no internet connection neededYour quest across the Elven Wonderland…Elven Woods – Levels 1-20Start your solitaire adventure in the elven woods. Full of fairies, wood elves and colourful mushrooms, you’re sure to meet some interesting characters to help you on your journey!Frozen Mountains – Levels 21-40Meet reindeer, enchanted snowmen and more as you play solitaire on the frozen path through the mountains. Be careful – it’s slippery!Wood Elf Village – Levels 41-60The simple wood elves live in beautiful houses carved into giant mushrooms and huge oak trees. Play solitaire and meet the elves who live here – maybe they’ll let you stay the night before you continue on your journey!Red Road Pass – Levels 61-80Once an active volcano, Red Road Pass is now a rough road of bright red stone. Discover rare gems as you walk along this challenging path playing solitaire with the mice who call it home.***More levels coming soon***==================================================================BE PART OF YOUR OWN SOLITAIRE STORY IN THE ELVEN WONDERLAND!==================================================================
descriptionHTML:
Lose yourself in the mysterious Elven Wonderland as you play solitaire across beautiful maps filled with magic, wonder and lots of interesting creatures!

Explore the Elven Woods and beyond!
The Elven Wonderland is full of amazing, mystical places. From the Elven Woods to the Frozen Lakes, you’ll have over 75 levels of solitaire to enjoy as you embark on a quest across each land. Every month, the solitaire story is expanded with brand new exciting maps and levels – so keep checking back for new updates!

A classic card game with a magical twist
Bringing the fun of solitaire to your smartphone – with a sprinkle of Elven magic – you’ll have hours of fun playing this relaxing single player card game. Just clear the piles of cards on the screen by selecting the card one value up or down from the card shown at the bottom of the screen. When you clear all the cards, you win!

Daily tasks & lots of free bonuses!
The Elven Wonderland is full of treasures and generous creatures who love to help you on your solitaire quest! Each day the wood elves will give you a list of tasks to earn extra coins, complete these tasks every day for huge rewards. Don’t want to complete tasks? You’ve been given a magical bowl that fills up with coins slowly for you to empty every day! If that wasn’t enough, you can replay each level to earn even more coins!

============================
Solitaire Quest – Highlights
============================
• A fun, relaxing single player card game
• Play solitaire across beautifully designed maps across Fairy Wonderland
• Over 75 levels with more added each month
• Unique elements in each level such as golden and locked cards
• Daily tasks – complete them for huge free rewards
• Empty the coin globe each day for free coins
• Spend your coins to unlock new, unique card sets and styles
• Get useful power ups to help on your solitaire quest
• Play solitaire offline – no internet connection needed

Your quest across the Elven Wonderland…

Elven Woods – Levels 1-20
Start your solitaire adventure in the elven woods. Full of fairies, wood elves and colourful mushrooms, you’re sure to meet some interesting characters to help you on your journey!

Frozen Mountains – Levels 21-40
Meet reindeer, enchanted snowmen and more as you play solitaire on the frozen path through the mountains. Be careful – it’s slippery!

Wood Elf Village – Levels 41-60
The simple wood elves live in beautiful houses carved into giant mushrooms and huge oak trees. Play solitaire and meet the elves who live here – maybe they’ll let you stay the night before you continue on your journey!

Red Road Pass – Levels 61-80
Once an active volcano, Red Road Pass is now a rough road of bright red stone. Discover rare gems as you walk along this challenging path playing solitaire with the mice who call it home.

***More levels coming soon***

==================================================================
BE PART OF YOUR OWN SOLITAIRE STORY IN THE ELVEN WONDERLAND!
==================================================================

comments: This is by far the best chess "trainer" for me.  It's got a nice flow and the game isn't "stupid" like most other chess apps/games I've played.  I plat at least a few games every night and I feel like it give me a nice challenge and makes me really think about the moves I'm making.  Especially at the higher difficulty levels.  Overall a great chess app with no glitches and a good brain inside of it.  A must for a chess player with any real skill at the game.

I really was worried it would be too easy or too tough. tho I am not a master, yet, I know my way around the board.  I realized it has been making me a spectacular player ..the computer does not just do the same dumb moves over and over its almost like its stalking me like prey around the board! ha great game!!!-!!

I love this game and the best brain exerciser game ever in the history.  The cool 3d view makes the game as if I am playing on the real board, very good graphics. However, it doesn't show the list of killed chessman during game play the only drawback. I am expecting this upgradation and this will be the perfect Android chess.

So far it's o.k. I like the fact that it is simply a chess game with no fancy sound effects or graphics. I see no real reason to have the higher difficulty levels locked out until they are beaten but they are. I got it to practice with. It is useful for that. It's not bad...Just a simple down to earth chess game

The game has been drawn because the other player has no legal move and is not in check. If they can ot move then I win because they cannot move to a legal position. The computer ends the games too early because they cannot be bothered to chase you around the board. You cannot unlock the higher difficulty games because it just says draw.

Not 100% sure how that works but the other person has their king and it's a stale mate and I have practically most of my pieces but to unlock harder levels I have to win. Does stalemate not count? I think its pretty stupid
description: Chess in your AndroidChess is a board game for two players. It is played on a square board, made of 64 smaller squares, with eight squares on each side. Each player starts with sixteen pieces: eight pawns, two knights, two bishops, two rooks, one queen and one king. The goal of the game is for each player to try and checkmate the king of the opponent. Checkmate is a threat ('check') to the opposing king which no move can stop. It ends the game.During the game the two opponents take turns to move one of their pieces to a different square of the board. One player ('White') has pieces of a light color; the other player ('Black') has pieces of a dark color. There are rules about how pieces move, and about taking the opponent's pieces off the board. The player with white pieces always makes the first move. Because of this, White has a small advantage, and wins more often than Black in tournament games.Chess is popular and is often played in competitions called chess tournaments. It is enjoyed in many countries, and is a national hobby in Russia.Features:- five different themes- seven levels of difficulty- two players mode- game assistant (Helper)- realistic graphics- sound effects- small size
descriptionHTML:
Chess in your Android

Chess is a board game for two players. It is played on a square board, made of 64 smaller squares, with eight squares on each side. Each player starts with sixteen pieces: eight pawns, two knights, two bishops, two rooks, one queen and one king. The goal of the game is for each player to try and checkmate the king of the opponent. Checkmate is a threat ('check') to the opposing king which no move can stop. It ends the game.

During the game the two opponents take turns to move one of their pieces to a different square of the board. One player ('White') has pieces of a light color; the other player ('Black') has pieces of a dark color. There are rules about how pieces move, and about taking the opponent's pieces off the board. The player with white pieces always makes the first move. Because of this, White has a small advantage, and wins more often than Black in tournament games.

Chess is popular and is often played in competitions called chess tournaments. It is enjoyed in many countries, and is a national hobby in Russia.

Features:

- five different themes
- seven levels of difficulty
- two players mode
- game assistant (Helper)
- realistic graphics
- sound effects
- small size
summary: Chess is a board logic game with beautiful graphics and progressive levels
title: Chess

comments: In love with it every second I used it. Have been missing it on my Coolpad Note 3 due to certain glitches with my copy of Warriors Orochi & Orochi 2. The MALI-T720 really sucks. But loving it again on my Lenovo Z2 Plus with Snapdragon 820 and Vulkan. Love the fast forward key, it makes me go LOL sometimes in games. Soon going to buy the Gold Version now as I have a better compatible device. Thank you dev for such a pleasurable claasic experience. Love ya. 😃

After the recent update, the app is crashing quite frequently. Hopefully this will be fixed soon. But Vulcan support is appreciated, it seriously improves frame rate and audio, plus the texture looks nicer too. It's a blessing I can play persona 3 on my phone. Haven't tried many other games though. Will edit and update the score once the game crashes are improved. Lastly, thank you to the developer for this amazing emulator.

This has continued to be an amazing app! The ability to run most PSP games flawlessly on my phone is incredible. My PSP broke a while back and I haven't had the money to buy the system again. I had missed playing my favorite PSP games. Now I still can! I highly recommend this app! I also recommend trying Dead Head Fred on it! Fantastic PSP title!

I use a Samsung Galaxy Note 8 (yes the best-of-the-best). And as soon as I selected Vulkan, instead of OpenGL all my games like Midnight Club 3, Midnight Club LA and even Gran Turismo works SUPER FAST AND ON AMAZING 5x PSP resolution. The only thing disappointing is that the emulator doesn't work full screen. *PLEASE ADD FULL SCREEN SUPPORT FOR SAMSUNG GALAXY NOTE 8*. BEST PSP EMULATOR.

Its a fantastic emulator and the best .. using it since 3 years..!! Gameplay is Great.. Graphics could be improved.. Sound is Glitchy (metal gear solid - peace walker).. fix it soon...!! ❤️ You PPSSPP..!!  *Cheats- I'm unable to use it.. (Make it happen soon.. probably the next update 😇) Best app on Playstore for me..!!😍😍😍 Make enhancements for HiKirin Socs.. Creators  of  PPSSPP .. please make an emulator for ps2 also (it's my wish)

Came here to boast about being one of the lucky guys that can use Vulcan plugin 😁 Tekken six running smooth af on redme note 4. One star less is because games sometimes crash when I turn off my screen. My favourite settings like load latest save state and multi thread processing is missing for some reason.

comments: Very fun game. Multiplayer is awsome! Please add private matches so i can play with friends.   Physics still need work to hold up to real world standard. Rocks dont follow thru on take outs in real life as they do in this game. Also (rules), a rock needs to make it all the way over the hogline in order to stay in play.  Thank you for making this game!

Best curling game I've seen Enjoy the graphics, controls, love the 1 on 1 against international players and career game options. Seems consistent and easy to learn. Needs a few tweaks like... throws that don't make hog line or touch hogline must be taken out of play. Have seen the bug that others reported, sometimes rock after thrown disappears , some kind of glitch that happens occasionally.  Sometimes the sweepers don't react to my movement to sweep. Would love to see 8 stones instead of 6. If you love curling, this should satisfy

Great game except for hackers. There is a hack that allows some to bump or change finish of a throw. Yoy can go from having 2 scoring to opponent having the score, changing after the rocks stopped. Developers have not replied ti report. Fine for some fun but don't waste your money in upgrades

The physics of this game are terrible. It's fatal flaw is if you have a completely frozen rock, you physically can't remove it, but this game you can completely remove 3 rocks even if they are all frozen. Also the free guard rule is very loosley applied. This game clearly was not created by someone who has ever curled.

Physics are not like real curling, rocks are dead in the house when hit, physically impossible doubles and triples, improper use of the free guard zone rules (if a rock is in the house, it is free to be removed...not in this game).  Connecting people across the globe is a cool idea but you frequently lose people and you win without finishing a game.  I've played for 35 years so I speak from experience.

Full of cheaters Started to play and it was awesome. But it seems that some people created cheats and make your pins move from their places without even theirs touching them so that they win points. I will not play it until its updated and try again. Too bad.

comments: Amazing addictive game. Try it out! Not too many ads, and just the right amount of challenge without pulling your hair out. Sometimes there's a hidden dot in the title, or ones that are almost the same color as the background, but it's not bad enough to lose a star.

Updated with no fix...  problem still persists.  No exit button and controls for the back button are very wonky. Need to add dedicated exit button or fix what happens when you tap / swipe the blank park of the screen. Trying to bring the controls up from their hidden state selects options is frustrating. You end up starting games. Very unpolished controls, imo.

Cool game, only bad thing is that tutorial levels are rated as bronze so you can never have all gold.. I tried doing the same tutorial three times in a row, then it is counted as gold, but when you exit the game and enter again that it is bronze again

Interesting puzzle type game.  Using rope is a bit challenging on small screens.  It used way too much background data which is not have related at all.  My phone gets hot when using the app.  Uninstalling
Different and fun. Not too hard but still challenging.  Daily challenges are impossible to complete though (bug?) , so don't bother with them (hence my only giving 3 stars)

This right here is a work of genius.  My only wish is for an undo button, for when you accidentally touch a part of the screen and it places a spot/cut/bridge in an unwinnable spot.  Especially annoying during daily challenge that you can't re-do.  Also, I would like to be able to retry any level, such as the daily or randoms, even if it wouldn't "count". I'm convinced every so often there is an unwinable level, but you can't even test it or let the devs know because once you fail it goes away permanently.  Still, a great, great game... I really hope there is a V2 some day.

comments: Hello. I enjoy the game, I finished the story mode and I'm doing pretty well. There are a few issues though. The daily challenge you can get against Octavo (the robot?) Is the same as the one against Alyx, despite a different description. And some of the words need to be reviewed more thoroughly. I'm fairly certain "yellowishnesses" and "f**ckoff" aren't words, among others. If you could look into these, that would be great. Thanks! Cheers!

As enjoyable as expected. Needs to have an export or share words or list at the end of each round, to quick look up (send to dictionary app) new, unknown word definitions  -if it wants to be true word learning program. Features currently are more  han sufficient for spelling, Is there also a relaxed time mode? A bit buggy with relocation of caret and backspace deletes forward but once you get used to the fast tapping required, you fly through the levels. Or indeed, the retries of level.

The game is fun, varied, challenging but chill. It would be perfect, except that the Night Sky ad crashes the app every time. The other ads are fine (I mean, I don't like them, but they don't mess with the functionality of the app). It's just The Night Sky. Super annoying. If it keeps happening I'll have to find a new game that runs properly.

I liked the game but it didn't have many words. I mean it said Abdominal 😑 wasn't a real word, neither did it say antidisestablishmentarianism 🤓 was a word. I had to write it like 5 times 🙄 since the timer kept going up but when I finally did 😏is said it's not a real word 😲 so I took a screenshot of it to check if I spelt it right and I did. 😎 Other then that it's a wonderful game 😄

I would give 5 stars because I love the game, but after literally every single multiplayer match, it asks if you want to watch an ad for a free autocomplete. If you say no, you're forced to watch the ad anyways. I shouldn't have to be forced to watch ads if I don't want autocompletes. If this is changed I would happily rate 5 stars.

I love this game, for both it's smoothness when interacting with other players, and for the inherent challenge created by the random selection. If your vocabulary is humongous, or you're just looking to waste some time, or you are practicing you spelling, this game is fantastic for you. Add the fact that you can invite, and play with, friends, and you have a smash hit. To top it off, if you have a valid word, but the game didn't recognize it, you can send it to the developer to be added! Two thumbs up, all the way.
description: Confident in the size of your vocabulary? Show it off in this new word-based battle game! Play through Story Mode and try your best to outsmart one of the 6 word champions the game presents you with. With 8 stages for each opponent, you’re all set for hours of fun! Each stage has its own set of rules that you must follow in order to win, so be prepared for some tricky levels.It isn’t as easy as it sounds though, because you can’t just send in random words. Every word you use has to start with the same letter that the previous word ended with, and on some levels specific letters are banned. But don’t worry! If you’re at a loss for a word that fits the criteria established for you, just use the Auto Complete feature for some suggestions. And if you ever run out of Auto Completes, you can buy them through an in-game purchase!If playing against the computer isn’t your thing, try your hand at the Multiplayer Mode. Just login to your Facebook account with the app on your phone or tablet and it will save your progress and let you challenge friends to a game of Battle Text. And if none of your friends are playing just yet, you can use the Quick Match feature to play against a random opponent!FEATURES:6 unique personalities to compete against48 different levels to play through in Story ModeMultiplayer Mode! Play with friends or strangers!Social media connection so you can keep your progressIn-game purchases to get more Auto-Completes and remove ads
descriptionHTML:
Confident in the size of your vocabulary? Show it off in this new word-based battle game!

Play through Story Mode and try your best to outsmart one of the 6 word champions the game presents you with. With 8 stages for each opponent, you’re all set for hours of fun! Each stage has its own set of rules that you must follow in order to win, so be prepared for some tricky levels.

It isn’t as easy as it sounds though, because you can’t just send in random words. Every word you use has to start with the same letter that the previous word ended with, and on some levels specific letters are banned. But don’t worry! If you’re at a loss for a word that fits the criteria established for you, just use the Auto Complete feature for some suggestions. And if you ever run out of Auto Completes, you can buy them through an in-game purchase!
If playing against the computer isn’t your thing, try your hand at the Multiplayer Mode. Just login to your Facebook account with the app on your phone or tablet and it will save your progress and let you challenge friends to a game of Battle Text. And if none of your friends are playing just yet, you can use the Quick Match feature to play against a random opponent!

FEATURES:
6 unique personalities to compete against
48 different levels to play through in Story Mode
Multiplayer Mode! Play with friends or strangers!
Social media connection so you can keep your progress
In-game purchases to get more Auto-Completes and remove ads

comments: Okay, I really love this game, no joke, but recently something really annoying happened. I don't know if it's my own problem or the game's problem, but I deleted the game once and got it back again thinking all my balls were still saved. Once I opened the game and checked,I found nothing. I exited the game and tried again, but still nothing. I really hope it's all a bug or something...
Absousoulutley bombarded with adds during game play. Was a great game. Earn the next ball, to find you already have it. Bit frustraiting when you paid real dollars. Find soemthing else.

Great way to waste time. The ads are annoying, especially when you are given the "one more chance" option and are told there are no ads, only to have one show up a minute later. The home button on the pause screen is also a trap, especially if you accidentally touch it and lose a very high score. Annoyingly clickbait-y for ads, all in all.
Love the game, but it's impossible to see the super super small ball. I know it's supposed to be tiny, but at least let me see it.
I purchased 220 coins but I did not receive them in game. Yet the money was deducted from my balance.
I can't restore to my new device.Paid for no ads and some balls and now I have no access to them at all....

comments: I would've rated it 5 stars if it was somehow faster. I just want to fastforward all the animation that is happening there. I mean I saw it the first time. Great. I got it: "cat jumps into a boat and then goes underwater, after that it goes out". All this animation takes more time than the actual playing. Same thing with letters: I get letters every time. And I've stoped reading them cause there is a lot of text and I have no idea what for. Inspite of that - it's a good game. Nice and simple

I think this is a really cute game so far. Nice time waster. Couple of problems with reading letters, sometimes it will say "new" and nothing is there, or I try to read the letter and it ends and I can't scroll. Another plus would be to add how many fish are needed to get gold in the fish trophy category. Overall, still a really cute game. Worth the install no doubt!

Ads aren't a problem in this game. As for the game itself, my girlfriend and I love it. It's a good time waster and it can get pretty addicting. Some reviews expressed annoyance at the price of upgrades, but we have almost fully upgraded our gun and tank and it's been fine. We get about 40,000 each catch so far, so exchanging for parts is no big deal. Maybe people just haven't figured out how to be more efficient.

This game is just perfect. It has a complete free to play style and doesn't force ads upon you, instead, they are completely optional to get extra currency or more time. You could go through the entire game without watching a single dad if you wanted to and I love these types of games. The graphics are adorable and the controls are easy. I highly recommend this game.

Fun and relaxed game that I can easily see myself spending hours sniping fish. There is a bit of strategy to the game with the changing weather, predators, and upgrade system. Blindly shooting your harpoon will just lead to short, frustrating sessions so its best to learn the mechanics quickly or you'll end up with pretty sad catches. Thankfully, its a straightforward game so most should have no problem with it. With all the features, its well worth an install/play. Bonus? The ads are entirely optional and provide YOU bonuses.

It's hard to come across good mobile games on the playstorw, they're usually either a rip off of another game, or a half-baked pay to win game, this game is an exception however. It's completely free to play, I'm honestly not even sure if there is in app purchases, other games would make that clear and shove it down your throat. Also if you can get me to willingly watch an ad for a game, then you get 5 stars.

An unbelievable amount of ads in an otherwise fun game.   Ads after every match and spam ads trying to open my web browser multiple times mid match, somtimes when I'm preparing my shot which completely ruins it. Such a shame the devs chose to ruin their own game because of greed. Sadly this is more common than not nowadays.

I WANT to like this game. It's fun. The problem is the ads (I'm fine with ads. It's a free game) but mid game it randomly opens ads. I'm talking the kind that take you to a whole new window and tell you your phone is infected and won't let you go back without closing that tab. It screws up your shots and it's just NOT ok. Please fix this mess and I'll redownload and give the game a better review. Ads are one thing but when they make the game unplayable, I have to delete the game.

It's an amazing concept and idea that is very entertaining. The bad thing is that the ads interrupt the game so constantly that it messes up your shots and your online games too.  If that can be fixed so they appear after a match not in the middle of one that redirects you to a page full of ads and false notifications, then it will be a very awesome experience.

description: Quick, simple and easy, Yahtzee is an fun game that will challenge you plenty, and encourage you to try just one more game.Roll it to the limit for the ultimate win with the Yahtzee Classic game. Now with a casino- cool dice, you're ready to roll!Yahtzee is a dice game, which was first marketed as "Yatzie" in the early 1940s. Yatzie was included in a game set called "LUCK - 15 Grand Dice Games".Dice games, by their very nature, tend to rely much more on luck than skill. But playing the odds and calculating probabilities are definitely skills that can help you win the game Yatzy. The objective of the game is to score high points by rolling five dice to make certain combinations. Yahtzee is played with five dice. The dice can be rolled up to three times in a turn to try to make one of the thirteen possible scoring combinations. A game consists of thirteen rounds during which the player chooses which scoring combination is to be used in that round. Once a combination has been used in the game, it cannot be used again.Do the best dice combination in the this multiplayer Yahtzee game. Half of the fun of this game is to yell out the game's name if and when you roll one. A Yatzy occurs when a player rolls and all five dice are the same number. Special Yahtzee rule is, the first time you get a Yahtzee in a game it is worth 50 points (if you use it in the yahtzee slot). If you roll another Yahtzy after you have already got the 50 points (i.e., you didn’t take a zero), you will get a 100 point bonus.The Yahtzee scorecard contains 13 scoring boxes divided between two sections: 1) Upper section 2) Lower sectionNow play with your Facebook friends and with millions of Yahtzy players around the world.You can also create Private Rooms and invite your friends to play.Unique combination of luck and strategy makes every game of yahtzee an exciting challenge.Dice games are not only simple, but actually a lot of fun, regardless of whether you’re a child or an adult.If you're looking for some quick, light fun then yahtzee is the game for you.Download it for free today and have hours of fun. ◆◆◆◆ Yahtzee Features◆◆◆◆✔ Fast-paced, competitive and fun - for free!✔ Play with Facebook Friends or as Guest ✔ Create Private Room and Invite Friends and Family✔ Play with players across the worldAny suggestions? We always love to hear from you for making this game better. Enjoy playing Yahtzee!!Please don't forget to Rate and Review Yahtzee, we aim to make it one of the best board games out there
descriptionHTML:
Quick, simple and easy, Yahtzee is an fun game that will challenge you plenty, and encourage you to try just one more game.

Roll it to the limit for the ultimate win with the Yahtzee Classic game. Now with a casino- cool dice, you're ready to roll!

Yahtzee is a dice game, which was first marketed as "Yatzie" in the early 1940s.

Yatzie was included in a game set called "LUCK - 15 Grand Dice Games".

Dice games, by their very nature, tend to rely much more on luck than skill. But playing the odds and calculating probabilities are definitely skills that can help you win the game Yatzy.

The objective of the game is to score high points by rolling five dice to make certain combinations.

Yahtzee is played with five dice. The dice can be rolled up to three times in a turn to try to make one of the thirteen possible scoring combinations. A game consists of thirteen rounds during which the player chooses which scoring combination is to be used in that round. Once a combination has been used in the game, it cannot be used again.

Do the best dice combination in the this multiplayer Yahtzee game. Half of the fun of this game is to yell out the game's name if and when you roll one. A Yatzy occurs when a player rolls and all five dice are the same number.

Special Yahtzee rule is, the first time you get a Yahtzee in a game it is worth 50 points (if you use it in the yahtzee slot). If you roll another Yahtzy after you have already got the 50 points (i.e., you didn’t take a zero), you will get a 100 point bonus.

The Yahtzee scorecard contains 13 scoring boxes divided between two sections:
1) Upper section
2) Lower section

Now play with your Facebook friends and with millions of Yahtzy players around the world.

You can also create Private Rooms and invite your friends to play.

Unique combination of luck and strategy makes every game of yahtzee an exciting challenge.

Dice games are not only simple, but actually a lot of fun, regardless of whether you’re a child or an adult.

If you're looking for some quick, light fun then yahtzee is the game for you.

Download it for free today and have hours of fun.

Any suggestions? We always love to hear from you for making this game better.

Enjoy playing Yahtzee!!

Please don't forget to Rate and Review Yahtzee, we aim to make it one of the best board games out there

description: After the success of Cheeseburger factory, bhelpuri maker, and Italian food factory frolicfox proudly presents Potato Chips factory for those who love playing cooking and food making games.Potato chips are the most favorite and easily cooked snacks loved by kids and star chef. The great chef makes easy snack right in the microwave and on the stove!Making Homestyle potato chips masala in your own kitchen is fun and easy. Experiment with the thickness; you may like them thicker or thinner. You can use best ingredients to cook potato chips with low fats, like olive oil, safflower, corn, or peanut oil as well as vegetable oil.Potato chips masalas factory game trained you in a way so that you will be able to save a lot of hard-earned cash with less effort. Stop paying too much for the packed chips, instead try out at your own potato chips factory and prove yourself a master chef. Learn how easy it is to make your own homemade potato chips with an easy-to-follow recipe with photos of each step. The hardest part of potato chips cooking is cutting them thin which is easy in our factory with modern cutters and utensils. Enjoy potato chips maker and cooking game on your smartphone and enjoy yourself as a crazy chef.  How to Cook The recipe for cooking potato is very simple and saves a lot of time. You just need to follow the following easy steps. First of all to cook potato chips turn your deep fryer on high. Fill it up about halfway with cooking oil. Wash potatoes, Remove the chaff, sliced the potatoes with the cutting tools available in the factory. Boil the oil mixture and add sliced potatoes in it.  Add the chips to finish off and crisp up. After lifting them from the oil and letting them drain and cool, carefully take them out and put the chips on a plate. Add spices, black pepper, slats, and flavors to make it more delicious. After finish cooking gathers all the chips and starts packing. Pack the chips in colored wrappers and deliver them to the shop. Potato chips factory is a crazy cooking and food maker game for kids, little girls, and boys who love cooking.

descriptionHTML:
Build a zoo, play with cute animals and solve match 3 puzzles - all in one game!

Switch between the challenge of the match 3 levels, and the joy of welcoming a new furry friend to the zoo you built with your hands.

The Family Zoo was once the gem of the neighborhood. Now, the city wants to build a huge supermarket instead. It’s time to burst their bubble!

Solve casual match three puzzles to earn tickets and materials. Then, restore the zoo and decorate the animal habitats and surrounding gardens.

Meet new and old friends, and work together to make sure all the animals have a place to live. They are counting on you - can you save their home?

Game Features
✿ Swap between match 3 levels and building your own zoo!
✿ Hundreds of delicious and challenging match 3 puzzles
✿ Choose from thousands of decorations to make your family zoo unique!
✿ Interact with exotic and cute animals
✿ Develop your business with stands, cafes and other attractions to draw visitors and earn coins!
✿ Complete quests for more rewards and advancing the story
✿ Make friends with characters that will help you save the zoo

comments: Really like this game. It's like the love child of Civilization and Clash of Clans. Love the fact there's a different designs for units and buildings when using different nations. Lots of strategy and depth when it comes to battle. Also, includes events based on history. The only thing on my wishlist for this game is that they add a nation unaffiliated with any country and does not have special units so players can play through the default units and buildings through the ages like Yuri in C&C.

The Best Strategy Game I've ever played. Its because It has Unique way to play than other games.Every Level u go U will find out fun & adventures. I got addicted to this game. Speacilly I like the gameplay of this game because Its seems so real.Like,Survived soilder will return to your base,troops vs troops fight, no magic spell,Human made Weapon used in this game which is possible & I love unlocking new ages here. Supper Cool Game

This is one of those City Builder games where all that really matters is who has put in more time. The difference between ages is so dramatic that anyone who is an age above you will always win just because they have put more time into the game. That's just how it is and it becomes very empty eventually. You stand no chance against players with more play time.

Best empire game I've had. And I've downloaded probably all of them. Great aesthetic changes when upgrading buildings. The fact you can actually strategically place troops and attack is awesome. Love that resources respawn and that there's animations when farming them. The different nations with their advantages is a lovely touch.  The one draw back I would say is that it's expensive in a new players city to fulfil the task to join an alliance. Not a huge issue. Just would be nice to join friends sooner.  All in all amazing game. Great work Dev team

Fun game, although there is pretty strong pressure to purchase upgrades to complete missions after an hour or so of gameplay. Two stars because the "crown" reward. System does not work. As it should. Several tasks were completed for rewards and the reward never showed up. In fact, the reward mysteriously disappeared from my queue. Feels fishy to me...

There are offers for getting crowns by installing and and reaching some points in other games. Even though I completed them I never got the crowns. Furthermore the game is repetitive and absolutely unreliant on any kind of skill. The one thats further ahead in their build tree is the winner 99% when battling. The enjoyment this game hast to offer dwindles, when comparing this game to similar ones like lords mobile or forge of empires

descriptionHTML:
Grow a flourishing civilization and journey through all of human history as the leader of a mighty Nation!

BUILD a unique village of your own design. LEAD loyal citizens from the dawn of antiquity to the modern era. BATTLE cooperatively and competitively with players from across the world. RAID competing Nations for all their good loot!

Battle and build a civilization through history as you aim to conquer the world in DomiNations.

DOMINATIONS FEATURES:

GREAT LEADERS!
• At the new University, consult Leonardo Da Vinci, Catherine the Great, King Sejong and other historic thought leaders.
• Strengthen your Nation with the best war strategy!

BRAND NEW EVENTS!
• Accomplish fun limited-time goals based on actual events from history.
• Collect rare rewards to help your Nation advance so they can conquer the world!

FROM THE STONE AGE TO THE SPACE AGE
• Lead a colony of early hunters and gatherers on their conquest through the ages from the dawn of civilization to the modern era.
• Design a small civilization and grow it into a thriving metropolis.
• Build historic Wonders of the World, including famous landmarks like the Pyramids of Egypt and the Roman Colosseum.

CHOOSE YOUR NATION AND LEAD AN ARMY
• Battle as of one of 8 fearsome Nations on its journey through time.
• Choose one of the great civilizations from history like the Romans, British, Chinese, French, Germans, Japanese, Koreans and Greeks.
• Tackle historic battle campaigns to collect important resources and upgrade your city as you advance through history!
• Each civilization has a special strength to help you build unique units.
• Battle through history and advance your city, like longbowmen, vandals, and the mighty samurai!

DISCOVER NEW TECHNOLOGIES
• Legendary game designer Brian Reynolds brings history to life in every era as key advancements from each period in history will help you progress your epic civilization!
• Research each civilization, new materials, invent advanced weaponry, and develop trade to grow a bustling economy.
• Through scientific discovery, strengthen your troops with better equipment, upgrade your buildings and town center with modern materials.
• Create a war strategy to bolster your defenses as you grow stronger.

FORM AN ALLIANCE AND WAGE WORLD WAR
• Put your powerful Nation to the ultimate test in PvP combat and raid your enemies’ cities for huge bunches of loot!
• Battle for crucial resources, untold wealth, and total world domination.
• Team up with other skilled rulers and forge an unstoppable Alliance.
• Unleash the full force of your armies with a unique battle strategy to outwit and outlast your opponents in 50-on-50 Alliance warfare.
• Conquer the globe in World War and take home the spoils of war!

Build one of history’s greatest civilizations and develop a battle strategy to conquer opponents. Join an alliance and achieve world domination in DomiNations!

Download now to start building your civilization

NOTES:

A network connection and iOS 7 or above are required. DomiNations is optimized for iPads and iPhones generation 4S and newer. Playing on an iPhone 4 may result in slower performance and increased load times. The game is free to play, with additional purchases available in-game. If you do not want to make purchases in-game, please disable in-app purchases from your device settings.

https://www.nexonm.com/privacy-policy/

https://www.nexonm.com/terms-of-use/

recentChanges: DomiNations Tools of the Trade! v6.1 Update Notes
- Claymores will damage all enemies in a large cone in whatever direction they are first triggered.
- Tripping the Signal Flare will alert defending troops the enemy is near!
- Available in the Atomic Age, the Decoy Trap will draw the attacker’s fire to this phony target.
- Mystery Chests will automatically open and add their contents to your inventory after 30 Days.
- Baltimore Fencibles now deploys 1x Engineer and 2x Artillery
summary: Battle strategy game: Build an empire, wage war & conquer nations across history
title: DomiNations

comments: Really fun and I love Ellen! One thing I would like to see is the bonus wheels actually popping up. I've been playing for quite some time now and haven't even gotten one. Makes it more exciting when you get them 😊

Smooth as a babies bottom...cute as Biebier cheeks ....well that's kinda the same thingng....hmm..I think the graphics could use some help.  And the games a little dumbed down for what I would think Ellen would do but he'll... I'll wresstltle up ol Bessy and take her to daycare market so I can play sum .ore
I have a major exam coming up , but Ellen here is such a big distraction! Can't stop playing! Ugh! Love this game, let's hope ellen helps me pass my nursing exam! Lol much love ED! :)

I would love to give the game 5⭐ but I can't. Trying to get the bonus is like pulling teeth. I'm almost level 20 and have played a bonus game twice. How can anyone complete all the daily challenges when it seems impossible. I love Ellen. I watch her show everyday. I'm just disappointed in her online slot game.
Haven't got any puzzle pieces only1 bonus game threw 3 days of playing. And 2 free spin pay outs worth of 5 free spins. I wont be back.
It was  always freezing up during free   spins. So with sadness in my heart. Im going to have to uninstall  the game.
